story:
N1 Tours, your ticket to adventure

N1 Tours is a new business, that wishes to stay debt free, therefore crowdfunding is an approach, to help fund a vehicle to start with. N1 Tours are keeping the everyday Joe, who has his own little corner in the tourism industry, in mind to support them as well, and the goal is to

  • Create Jobs in a country with a very high unemployment rate.
  • Support other small businesses linked to the tourism industry.
  • To give tourists a chance to cost effectively experience this wonderful country.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • Right now, we need a new vehicle, that is trustworthy and robust to meet the needs of the
    business, and to give the tourist an experience they never will forget.
  • We need $80,000.00 to obtain this vehicle and fit it out with the necessary equipment. 
  • We have perks to die for, from photo journals of our maiden voyage, which we want to
    kick off in the new year, to souvenirs for mid-high perks and huge discounts to a holiday, and a raffle winner to get a South African holiday free! Please note, that this covers only the South African tours and excludes all airfares, airport taxes to and from South Africa, but your journey will start at the airport.
  • There is a possibility of the target not being met, but the funds will still be used to grow the
    business and to support local small businesses linked to the tourism of South Africa to help them grow. And we will still continue to rent the vehicles we need.

The Impact

We are looking into the support structure of other small businesses and startups:

  • The new startups and small businesses in the tourism will get firs priority, giving them a chance to grow, but quality will not be sacrificed, instead, if we see the quality is not to the standard we will focus on helping that business to raise the standards.
  • Your contribution will not go to waist. If the target has not been met, we will rather
    use the funds to help other small businesses to grow and improve. Constant updates will be posted.

!!!COMPANIES WHO WOULD LIKE TO CONTRIBUTE!!!

Not everyone wants or can partake what other perks have to offer, and you still want something
in return. What companies can use the most is exposure. What a great way to contribute, and to
receive returns on their investments,

In short, we will make sure that your branding would be visible in our videos and photos we take, there will always be a sponsored section in our newsletters, website, youtube and all of the social media available to use.

The two things we would need from you is your contribution, and your media you would want to use in this fashion, in electronic form. We will  take care of the rest.

This is a great way to help start an opportunity in an open market here in South Africa and reap the benefit of the kind of exposure you need as well. This is not just for N1 Tours, but for each and every person who have started in the tourist industry whose bussiness will be seeked out to help them grow as well. This also creates a platform for budget tours with good quality and an experience you will never forget.


Other Ways You Can Help

So you have come to this page and you have no means to help fund, but you can:

  • Spread the word, share the links to your Facebook, Twitter and ask them to spread the word as well.
  • It is best to use the tools that Indiegogo gives you to spread the word.

Final word:

I hope that this finds you in good spirit and that your heart and generosity is open, to help start something new, and to improve the lives this will touch.

Thank you very much
story_txt:
N1 Tours, your ticket to adventure
N1 Tours is a new business, that wishes to stay debt free, therefore crowdfunding is an approach, to help fund a vehicle to start with. N1 Tours are keeping the everyday Joe, who has his own little corner in the tourism industry, in mind to support them as well, and the goal is to

Create Jobs in a country with a very high unemployment rate.
Support other small businesses linked to the tourism industry.
To give tourists a chance to cost effectively experience this wonderful country.

 

What We Need & What You Get
 

Right now, we need a new vehicle, that is trustworthy and robust to meet the needs of thebusiness, and to give the tourist an experience they never will forget.
We need $80,000.00 to obtain this vehicle and fit it out with the necessary equipment. 
We have perks to die for, from photo journals of our maiden voyage, which we want tokick off in the new year, to souvenirs for mid-high perks and huge discounts to a holiday, and a raffle winner to get a South African holiday free! Please note, that this covers only the South African tours and excludes all airfares, airport taxes to and from South Africa, but your journey will start at the airport.
There is a possibility of the target not being met, but the funds will still be used to grow thebusiness and to support local small businesses linked to the tourism of South Africa to help them grow. And we will still continue to rent the vehicles we need.


The Impact
We are looking into the support structure of other small businesses and startups:

The new startups and small businesses in the tourism will get firs priority, giving them a chance to grow, but quality will not be sacrificed, instead, if we see the quality is not to the standard we will focus on helping that business to raise the standards.
Your contribution will not go to waist. If the target has not been met, we will ratheruse the funds to help other small businesses to grow and improve. Constant updates will be posted.


!!!COMPANIES WHO WOULD LIKE TO CONTRIBUTE!!!
Not everyone wants or can partake what other perks have to offer, and you still want somethingin return. What companies can use the most is exposure. What a great way to contribute, and toreceive returns on their investments,In short, we will make sure that your branding would be visible in our videos and photos we take, there will always be a sponsored section in our newsletters, website, youtube and all of the social media available to use.The two things we would need from you is your contribution, and your media you would want to use in this fashion, in electronic form. We will  take care of the rest.
This is a great way to help start an opportunity in an open market here in South Africa and reap the benefit of the kind of exposure you need as well. This is not just for N1 Tours, but for each and every person who have started in the tourist industry whose bussiness will be seeked out to help them grow as well. This also creates a platform for budget tours with good quality and an experience you will never forget.

Other Ways You Can Help
So you have come to this page and you have no means to help fund, but you can:

Spread the word, share the links to your Facebook, Twitter and ask them to spread the word as well.
It is best to use the tools that Indiegogo gives you to spread the word.

Final word:I hope that this finds you in good spirit and that your heart and generosity is open, to help start something new, and to improve the lives this will touch.Thank you very much

story:
A Product Made With Passion

Since making my first cocktail many years ago I developed a huge passion for the industry, going on to becoming an award winning mixologist and credited for my work by the likes of Ray Kelvin - CEO of Ted Baker. By creating The Cocktail Man I can now put that passion into a product, a product that I will send to you every month to make handcrafted cocktails, like you've never seen before. Each box will carry a story of how the cocktail was made and what inspired me to make it, with the classic variations backing it up. I want to share my creativity with you and help you discover a new concept of cocktails, making cocktails at home enjoyable and fun. 

How Does It Work?

For just £22 a month you can subscribe to The Cocktail Man via the website and I will then send you a box of the finest craft cocktail ingredients straight to your front door every month. Every box will be hand packed and labelled by myself and it will include enough ingredients to make 6 quality cocktails, with many different cocktail variations on offer.

What exactly will be in the box...

  • The Spirits
  • The Ingredients 
  • The Signature Garnish
  • The Equipment Needed
  • The Cocktail Man Booklet 

I will send you everything you need to make sure you have the best cocktail experience possible, from amazing garnishes to a booklet designed specifically for each box. With a story to be told behind every cocktail, the booklet will include an introduction to what inspired me to make the signature cocktail, the history of each cocktail and a step by step guide on how to make the cocktail to an award winning standard. 

Social & Enjoyable

I know how difficult making cocktails at home can be, having to find the right spirits and then finding the correct recipe online, to where you may find you may not even like it. You will also find it can cost a lot of money, first you have to buy the correct equipment and then you have to buy the spirits and mixers, before you know it you've spent a small fortune on something you haven't even tried yet.

I want to help you save money and all the hassle cocktails at home bring, by providing you with the exact measurements needed and a step by step guide on how to make the cocktails you will find the experience a lot more enjoyable. I will give you a chance to try spirits you have never even heard off and try things that aren't available in the local shops. Making cocktails at home should be a fun, social and enjoyable experience and I want The Cocktail Man to provide you with that experience. 

Who Is The Cocktail Man?

The Cocktail Man was set up by myself James Vyse, an award winning mixologist. Having looked at other cocktail subscriptions I noticed one thing, there is nothing unique or personal to be offered which is why I created The Cocktail Man. I want each and every box to tell a story and be personal to you. Making cocktails isn't just about mixing and shaking it up, it's an art. I am very passionate and for many years I have learned this fine art, now I want to share my knowledge with you.

Since my very first job, I knew this was something I loved doing and soon realised what goes into making a fine cocktail. It gripped me how much skill goes into making one drink so I took it upon myself to perfect it.

Now I want to share all this with you, by creating these boxes I can express my passion and help you master the fine art of mixology. I have worked tirelessly over the past 6 months to make The Cocktail Man a reality and to plan a year ahead. I want to bring into your home cocktails and spirits you never knew existed, with every box teaching you something new. I have huge plans for The Cocktail Man, creating some incredible cocktails on the way.

Future Plans 

With plans already set I can achieve what no other cocktail subscription company has yet.

A Custom Made Box - I will create a box based on your personal preference and design a cocktail specifically for you. These will be available to purchase from early next year and I have a limited number available at an Early Bird price, so don't miss out on a perfect treat or gift.

Home-Made Infusions - You will get the chance to infuse your very own spirits with The Cocktail Man providing you with Infusion Kits, making cocktails more personal to your palette.

Barrel Aged Cocktails - My favorite cocktail is made in a barrel and now I can share that with you. By barrel ageing spirits I can bottle them up and send them to your door, so you can make barrel aged cocktails in your own home.

Home-Made Syrups - By providing you with the right ingredients you can make your very own syrups so you can add some incredible flavors to your cocktails.

Make Your Own Gin Kit - I have plans to help you make your very own gin at home, providing you with the necessary equipment to do so.

Creative Garnishes - I am known for my very creative garnishes, and now you will be too. I will show you some of the most creative and unique garnishes you have seen in a cocktail.

I want to bring all these plans and ideas to your front room, and share with you my ever lasting passion for this fine art. 

With Your Help...

I can launch a new website and create something that will be personal to you. I can purchase my early stock and bring some of my ideas to life. With your help I can start a marketing campaign that will send my message across to the right people, inviting them to enjoy this new concept of cocktails at home. Ultimately your help will let me deliver my passion, to you.

Get The First Box Now

Early Bird: January Special - Get the first ever box now and see my first edition which will help you discover The Perfect Serve of a Gin & Tonic. These boxes are strictly limited and will give you a chance to taste the finest Gins from all around Europe at an incredible price! The box will include...

  • 6 X 30ml Premium Gins from around Europe
  • 2 X 150ml Fever-Tree Indian Tonic Water (Slimline Tonic Available)
  • 1g of Juniper Berries
  • The Perfect Serve Booklet

Risks & Challenges

Having been planning this for many months now I have already confirmed with suppliers my orders can be fulfilled on time, I'm all set to ship now and i just need your help to get the go ahead.  

Please note you must be 18 years of age at the time of purchase.

Thank you.

story:
Hello – We are Lindsey Fish and Lucy Chaplin A.K.A Fish and Chaps

 

We organise 'THE Exhibition for Mums on a Mission'

In June 2016 we held two pilot events, described as ‘life-changing’ by attendees.  The events are child-friendly, feature over 40 exhibitors, 8 taster workshops, speed networking and a Q&A panel.  Everything is tailored to inspire, offer know-how and tools for mums to start-up, grow a business or work from home. 

Mums in Business is a ‘movement’ set to be worth £9.5 billion to the UK economy by 2025.  It is becoming ever more apparent that working 9-5 just doesn’t work around family life and starting a business has never been a more popular choice for new mums.  We like thousands, if not millions of other mums don’t see why our talents should go to waste.  We believe women can be fulfilled in their professional life as well as their home life, so we made it our business to connect them with awesome organisations who can help them achieve that through our events.

A major thing to point out about our events is that our attendees are our number one priority so we carefully vet every organisation that get involved.  We do this to make sure there is no foul play, no silly promises or unrealistic business opportunities and outrageous claims.  In order to truly change lives, we need exhibitors who are on board with our mission.  Everything is optional for those who attend, no forced sales pitches and no obligation to do or buy anything. 

In 2017 we already have some excellent exhibitors lined up and over 300 attendees are already registered for an event which is 3 months way. 

We will prove within 5 years that the Mums Enterprise Roadshow has had a positive impact in helping to facilitate the growth of the ‘Mum Economy’ in the UK.  It will help new businesses start and flourish which, in turn, will create more jobs.  But above all, we will help make thousands of mums happy and fulfilled.  By supporting our campaign you can be proud that you have been a part of that.

We are truly shooting for the moon, as the saying goes 'Shoot for the moon, even if you miss you’ll land amongst the stars’

In 2017 events in Brighton, London and Birmingham will reach up to 1,500 mums face-to-face and almost one million through targeted marketing campaigns.  In 2018 there will be five events, increasing year on year, by 2021 our aim is for 11 regional events reaching all corners of the UK. 

Now it’s time to ask for your help making it happen!

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking to reach a total of £10,000 by mid-December 2016 and in return, you will get one of our awesome perks, with options suitable for business and individual backers.  And remember attending our events is FREE so please feel free to come along.  But we think the best thing is being part of our mission and helping mums on theirs.  You can be proud that you are helping us reach as many mums as possible to help unlock so much talent in the UK.

Lucy and I have been working on these events for 18 months.  Now it’s time to step the mission up a gear and to do that we need:

  1. Website:  Totally update and future proof our website to manage and communicate multiple events in one place.  See our current website here 

 

  1. Smart Marketing:  We need to spend money to generate an income for our business and guarantee footfall at our events.  Marketing is essential and your funds will make sure mums know we are here and we can help.  Our events are awesome we need to make sure mums know about them.
     
  2. Additional resource:  This campaign will help fund additional resource in the form of outsourced talented mums.  To grow and scale as we plan we need support, we know where to find the talent and skills we need but we need help funding it.

Every penny will be put into this business and we will make every penny work hard.

The Impact 

Mums who attended our 2016 events in June described them as ‘Life Changing’. Watch this video from Helen White who has since launched her business idea and will be coming back to share her experiences with a 2017 audience.

 

 

Other Feedback

“I absolutely loved it. So so useful.  It's given me tons of inspiration to get cracking on what I want to achieve. Was great to speak to like minded mums. Thank you so much .❤”

“Great atmosphere, Great connections, Great value and Masterpiece in regards to organisation.”

“Amazing, inspiring and thought provoking. Mum's it's a day that could change your life and give you new direction and motivation. Being surrounded by like minded people in similar situations is reassuring, comforting and compelling.”

Risks & Challenges

We are launching this campaign to mitigate a very true risk which is cashflow.  As mentioned there are a lot of costs involved in running events like venues, AV, marketing and so much more.    We have managed this so far but for 2017 as we grow this becomes a bigger challenge for us as the outlaid costs increase to a higher level than in 2016.  We need to be one step ahead of the game and need capital available to outlay before we see our returns.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to pledge anything right now not to worry we appreciate the time you have spent looking at our page.

You can still help by sharing the page with your friends and professional network, share on social media and shout as loud as you can for us about our events but please it is so important you share this page.  What's a crowdfund without a crowd after all :-)

Your business can also exhibit at our events contact Lindsey if this is of interest Lindsey@mumsenterprise.events

Follow us on @MumsEnterprise for both Twitter and Facebook and of course, you can register to attend one of our events for free see www.mumsenterprise.events/visit

story:
Who Is Toastilla® Designed For...

The Original “Toastilla”: Designed with YOU in mind, to be used as a multipurpose cooking device that utilizes your own toaster to create endless possibilities, Toastilla is what every consumer needs. With its hinged bottom, interlocking handles and sleek design, Toastilla can cook anything from corn tortillas to quesadillas (or as we like to refer to them…Toastilla Pockets), from frozen foods to fresh from the garden peppers and veggies, right in your toaster. When you’re finished, Toastilla stores beautifully on your counter, right in your toaster. Toastilla is made of food grade stainless steel with high temp plastic handles designed to stay cool to the touch, so there’s no need to worry about burning your fingers. Toastilla can also be placed in the dishwasher as needed. Toastilla is light weight and can easily be packed in a bag or suitcase when traveling. Everyone needs a Toastilla.

Tacos (Tortillas Cooked in the Toaster with Toastilla®)

Household Use – So many uses: quick snack, on-the-go morning breakfast, re-purpose leftovers, teach kids independence and good eating habits, give kids responsibility at dinner time

S'mores Toastilla® Pocket

College Students – No access to a kitchen? With a few on hand or easily accessible ingredients you can create healthy quick snacks during study hour, a quick breakfast as you run out to your first class or a delicious midnight snack.

Margherita Toastilla® Pocket

Travelers (Work or Pleasure) – Traveling and the constant eating out can get expensive, pack Toastilla and use the hotels toaster in the lobby or in your room to take some of the burden off your food budget while traveling. Be in control of your food, never go hungry when running late for a meeting.

Brie Cheese & Candied Walnut Toastilla® Pocket

Employers – What’s one staple in the break room? A toaster. Now that toaster can be used for more than just the morning toast, allowing employees to easily access a healthy on-the-go snack or meal without having to leave the office.

Cheese Steak Toastilla® Pocket

Differentiating Factors – Toastilla strives to promote healthier eating on the go. By allowing you to cook corn tortillas, in your toaster, for taco night, you are left with perfectly heated tortillas with no need for excess fat from cooking in oil and done quicker than it would take you to heat up the pan. With Toastilla your tortillas stand upright in your toaster, keeping their shape, not bending or breaking and Toastilla makes it easy to pull your tortillas out of the toaster without burning your fingers. But, it doesn’t stop there. You can wrap anything in a flour tortilla, execute the classic “Toastilla” fold, lay it on the Toastilla, clamp it shut and pop it in your toaster. Out pops a creation that’s perfectly taught and slightly crispy on the outside with warm, fresh ingredients on the inside. We have compiled a cookbook of some of our favorite recipes so far, ranging from the classic Cheese Toastilla Pocket to a Pizza Toastilla Pocket, Margharita Toastilla Pocket or even a Toastilla Pocket made with Brie Cheese. The possibilities are endless.

Experience – With our team initially consisting of business development and growth experience, as Toastilla’s been put in motion, we have been able to establish a wonderful team across the board for marketing, designing and manufacturing as well. We feel blessed with the team we have established and know that they are a dynamic team that can accomplish great things.

How Toastilla® Came About...

The recession forced the 2011 closing of my once thriving landscaping company. We lived on the little savings we had hoping things would turn around. In survival mode things go by the way side, like repairing broken appliances such as a stovetop with only 2 working burners, the small ones at that. Needless to say, each night presented a challenge to cook dinner. One night we were preparing tacos with meat on one burner, beans on another, trying to find room to cook rice while trying to figuring out how to cook the tortillas. I looked over and there was our toaster. So, I plopped in a couple tortillas and they turned out great. Only problem was they fell to the bottom, curling up. Getting them out was difficult and they took on a rather awkward shape for tacos, but I knew I was onto something. That’s when Toastilla was born.

Who We Are...

The Gallego Family

We are an ordinary family, ready to do extraordinary things. With having built and run a landscaping business as a husband and wife team for over 12 years, while raising 4 kids, we decided with the change in economy and nature of landscaping, we were ready for a change too. Having always been a thinker, creator and designer, I decided it was time for some of my ideas to come to life. In 2016 I am starting DI Works LLC and launching my first product Toastilla. While this has been a whole new world for me, the whirlwind of knowledge I have gained over this past year of planning for our launch has been truly amazing. As our family begins this new journey, we want to always make sure of the following:

Mission – DI Works LLC’s mission is to take everyday concerns, from our own ideas to concerns prompted by our consumers and turn them into solutions. We strive to build a network from consumers to manufacturers, marketing agents and beyond to turn solutions into reality.

Vision – Our overall vision for DI Works LLC is to become a household name. From the start of our original product, Toastilla, to our tenth product and beyond. We want to provide simple, affordable solutions to everyday problems.

Values – We promise to:

  • Never compromise quality in our products
  • Never underestimate the power of the consumer’s idea
  • Never take ourselves too seriously, dream, design and make reality fun
  • Always keep focus on our humble beginnings

Backer Levels:

 

A Special Thanks To..

 

Risks and challenges:

While every company has a certain amount of risks, we feel that with our dedication to growing with minimal debt, we minimize the risk of a company that is set-up to fail from the start. Other factors that pose a risk for us, include:

• No previous personal manufacturing experience
• Moving from experience in localized marketing to mass marketing
• Low start-up capital to initiate high volumes of products and large scale productions

Although these are all risk factors, we feel that we have done much of the leg work ahead of time in order to minimize these risks and feel confident that we can take them on. Through the advice of our mentor and our securing of a manufacturer, we feel that with Toastilla’s design complete we are ready to take on whatever comes our way.

After designing, studying, reworking, working with designers, working with manufacturers and working with numerous other professionals, we'd like to think everything will run smoothly from this point out and and from our first deign to our current, our entire team has been working to make sure we have everything lined up full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment, but here are what we see as other possible risks at this point:

PRODUCTION:

At this point our tooling is complete, so...

We will be receiving our first small production run in the next couple of weeks.

As we gear up for large scale production, there will likely be some minor adjustments to improve the final product. We will always be making product improvements to make it better, and we'll let you know exactly how and why any are made.

We are working with manufacturers who have years of experience delivering excellent products in tremendous quantities. There will probably be some surprises along the way, but any obstacle will be addressed by combining our internal knowledge with external expertise, and an overall goal of making the best possible product for you.
story_txt:
Who Is Toastilla® Designed For...
The Original “Toastilla”: Designed with YOU in mind, to be used as a multipurpose cooking device that utilizes your own toaster to create endless possibilities, Toastilla is what every consumer needs. With its hinged bottom, interlocking handles and sleek design, Toastilla can cook anything from corn tortillas to quesadillas (or as we like to refer to them…Toastilla Pockets), from frozen foods to fresh from the garden peppers and veggies, right in your toaster. When you’re finished, Toastilla stores beautifully on your counter, right in your toaster. Toastilla is made of food grade stainless steel with high temp plastic handles designed to stay cool to the touch, so there’s no need to worry about burning your fingers. Toastilla can also be placed in the dishwasher as needed. Toastilla is light weight and can easily be packed in a bag or suitcase when traveling. Everyone needs a Toastilla.
Tacos (Tortillas Cooked in the Toaster with Toastilla®)

Household Use – So many uses: quick snack, on-the-go morning breakfast, re-purpose leftovers, teach kids independence and good eating habits, give kids responsibility at dinner time
S'mores Toastilla® Pocket

College Students – No access to a kitchen? With a few on hand or easily accessible ingredients you can create healthy quick snacks during study hour, a quick breakfast as you run out to your first class or a delicious midnight snack.
Margherita Toastilla® Pocket

Travelers (Work or Pleasure) – Traveling and the constant eating out can get expensive, pack Toastilla and use the hotels toaster in the lobby or in your room to take some of the burden off your food budget while traveling. Be in control of your food, never go hungry when running late for a meeting.
Brie Cheese & Candied Walnut Toastilla® Pocket

Employers – What’s one staple in the break room? A toaster. Now that toaster can be used for more than just the morning toast, allowing employees to easily access a healthy on-the-go snack or meal without having to leave the office.
Cheese Steak Toastilla® Pocket

Differentiating Factors – Toastilla strives to promote healthier eating on the go. By allowing you to cook corn tortillas, in your toaster, for taco night, you are left with perfectly heated tortillas with no need for excess fat from cooking in oil and done quicker than it would take you to heat up the pan. With Toastilla your tortillas stand upright in your toaster, keeping their shape, not bending or breaking and Toastilla makes it easy to pull your tortillas out of the toaster without burning your fingers. But, it doesn’t stop there. You can wrap anything in a flour tortilla, execute the classic “Toastilla” fold, lay it on the Toastilla, clamp it shut and pop it in your toaster. Out pops a creation that’s perfectly taught and slightly crispy on the outside with warm, fresh ingredients on the inside. We have compiled a cookbook of some of our favorite recipes so far, ranging from the classic Cheese Toastilla Pocket to a Pizza Toastilla Pocket, Margharita Toastilla Pocket or even a Toastilla Pocket made with Brie Cheese. The possibilities are endless.
Experience – With our team initially consisting of business development and growth experience, as Toastilla’s been put in motion, we have been able to establish a wonderful team across the board for marketing, designing and manufacturing as well. We feel blessed with the team we have established and know that they are a dynamic team that can accomplish great things.
How Toastilla® Came About...
The recession forced the 2011 closing of my once thriving landscaping company. We lived on the little savings we had hoping things would turn around. In survival mode things go by the way side, like repairing broken appliances such as a stovetop with only 2 working burners, the small ones at that. Needless to say, each night presented a challenge to cook dinner. One night we were preparing tacos with meat on one burner, beans on another, trying to find room to cook rice while trying to figuring out how to cook the tortillas. I looked over and there was our toaster. So, I plopped in a couple tortillas and they turned out great. Only problem was they fell to the bottom, curling up. Getting them out was difficult and they took on a rather awkward shape for tacos, but I knew I was onto something. That’s when Toastilla was born.
Who We Are...

The Gallego Family
We are an ordinary family, ready to do extraordinary things. With having built and run a landscaping business as a husband and wife team for over 12 years, while raising 4 kids, we decided with the change in economy and nature of landscaping, we were ready for a change too. Having always been a thinker, creator and designer, I decided it was time for some of my ideas to come to life. In 2016 I am starting DI Works LLC and launching my first product Toastilla. While this has been a whole new world for me, the whirlwind of knowledge I have gained over this past year of planning for our launch has been truly amazing. As our family begins this new journey, we want to always make sure of the following:
Mission – DI Works LLC’s mission is to take everyday concerns, from our own ideas to concerns prompted by our consumers and turn them into solutions. We strive to build a network from consumers to manufacturers, marketing agents and beyond to turn solutions into reality.
Vision – Our overall vision for DI Works LLC is to become a household name. From the start of our original product, Toastilla, to our tenth product and beyond. We want to provide simple, affordable solutions to everyday problems.
Values – We promise to:

Never compromise quality in our products
Never underestimate the power of the consumer’s idea
Never take ourselves too seriously, dream, design and make reality fun
Always keep focus on our humble beginnings

Backer Levels:


 

A Special Thanks To..

While every company has a certain amount of risks, we feel that with our dedication to growing with minimal debt, we minimize the risk of a company that is set-up to fail from the start. Other factors that pose a risk for us, include:• No previous personal manufacturing experience• Moving from experience in localized marketing to mass marketing• Low start-up capital to initiate high volumes of products and large scale productions
Although these are all risk factors, we feel that we have done much of the leg work ahead of time in order to minimize these risks and feel confident that we can take them on. Through the advice of our mentor and our securing of a manufacturer, we feel that with Toastilla’s design complete we are ready to take on whatever comes our way.
After designing, studying, reworking, working with designers, working with manufacturers and working with numerous other professionals, we'd like to think everything will run smoothly from this point out and and from our first deign to our current, our entire team has been working to make sure we have everything lined up full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment, but here are what we see as other possible risks at this point:

We are working with manufacturers who have years of experience delivering excellent products in tremendous quantities. There will probably be some surprises along the way, but any obstacle will be addressed by combining our internal knowledge with external expertise, and an overall goal of making the best possible product for you.

story:
Why a Just Be Yoga expansion? 

The Just Be Yoga tribe is an ever-growing community. Everyday we witness the incredible capacity for yoga to touch lives and change the world, and we intend to use everyday as an opportunity for more people to truly live yoga.

Within these first three years of being open, we have grown to the point of requiring additional studio space for our evolving community. However, in March of 2016, a car crashed into our second studio, causing serious damage to the building and leaving JBY without the necessary space needed to support the growth of our sacred tribe.

Even with the loss of the second studio and the denied claim from the insurance company, we are moving forward with an ever bigger vision and expanding JBY to a new building with incredible potential - and only minutes away from our current home. However, due to the denied claim, size of the project, and the requirements of the city, the financial scope goes beyond JBY's capacity to do it on our own.  

Time and time again, we have heard the calls from our tribe that you are ready, willing, and wanting to offer support to this community and place that you consider family and home. And now you can!

 

What will the JBY expansion offer?

  • More class offerings
  • More mat space
  • Larger space for community to gather
  • Expanding workshop opportunities
  • Advanced teacher trainings
  • Ample parking
  • A shower
  • Additional bathroom facilities
  • More retail offering

 

What are we asking for? 

Up to this point JBY has raised all but $50k, and considering the total amount we are very close! So, we are asking for $50,000 in 50 days, and with the magic we have witnessed within this community, we know just how possible this is.  

Any and all support for the JBY Studio Expansion will go directly into the project itself:

  • City fees and requirements
  • Building improvements 
  • Contractor fees 
  • General construction (flooring, walls, heating, etc.)
  • Furniture and necessary furnishings
  • Additional yoga props 

We are going to do our best to utilize the power of our community to support with paint, planters, building furniture, and so on.  

The Project's perks are designed to offer you, our contributors, all the things you already love about the studio - including classes, memberships, speciality workshops, and JBY merchandise. 

*Class and membership perks are transferable to another name. Unclaimed class and membership perks expire December 31, 2017. 

 

Why yoga? 

In the conversations happening throughout our community and the transformations experienced in JBY classes and trainings, we have seen the power that comes with the practice of yoga. This practice has proven to affect change in individual lives, Walnut Creek and surrounding communities, and the world at large. And with that, Just Be Yoga stands firm in our vision to keep our studio and offerings inclusive and available to any and all who wish to experience and share the power of yoga.   

And it all starts with our physical space. This new space will make it possible for us to invite more people into our community, and to continue expanding the offerings that support our tribe and the affect yoga has on lives, community, and the world.  

 

Other Ways You Can Support Us! 

Regardless, we are so grateful for your everyday contributions to the JBY community. If you are unable to support us financially at this time you can instead share this campaign with your community, family, and friends. Your willingness to share this project and ask for support on our behalf is of incredible value to our mission. And we thank you for that. 

 

We are so grateful to our community and tribe. We would not be who we are without you. 

With love and gratitude, 

the JBY Tribe

story:
Who we are:

The Clark County 4-H Robotics Club fills a unique niche in our community. We are not linked to any school, and students throughout the county can join 4-H at no cost. This creates a robotics option for teens that would otherwise not have access to a FIRST team, either because their school doesn't have a team, or they are attending an online school, or perhaps they are homeschooled. 4-H takes them all.

What we're doing:

While we had a disappointing finish at our first District match in Oregon City (finishing 25th out of 32 teams), we learned a lot.  Our challenges ranged from design shortfalls, inattention to detail, inadequate communication, and bad luck.

Fortunately, the team demonstrated great resiliency and perseverance.  While everyone was wiped out from the intense 6-week build season and the Oregon City competition, the team knew we could do better.  

Instead of simply preparing to show up at Wilsonville, the team came together to dig a little deeper and address the shortfalls.  

And, by doing so, we arrived at Wilsonville with the optimism and confidence we needed to be the most consistent, high performing team in the competition.  We earned a 2nd place position after the 12 qualifying matches, then proceeded to join a 3-team alliance that won the 33-team Wilsonville event! 

It's a great story because it represents growth in technical skills and experience as well as organization and communication – and it demonstrates the fruits of perseverance and hard work. 

And now - we have been invited to the FIRST PNW District Championships!


Why we need YOU!

In the club's 5 year history, we have never done this well.  We had not planned or budgeted to to attend the Regional District Champtionship competition.  We need your help!  We have to cover:

  • Registration Fees
  • Room  & Board for kids and mentors


We are a 501c3 non-profit - your donation is tax deductable!

story:
First of all, we would like to thank you for taking the time to read about this project.

We are almost done with the website http://smallbusiness.marketing however with a little extra help from you this website can go to the next level. All we need to get done is pay for the best content writers we can find to add the original content to the website.

What is the Purpose of SmallBusiness.Marketing?

We want to start a membership based website where users pay a yearly fee to join. In return they get to post as many articles as they want and they get to link their Google Adsense account or any other type of affiliate program to their articles. The member will get 100% of the revenue generated from their advertisements on their content.

What we need

The website will have a much better chance of succeeding if we have a great initial amount of content on the website before we really promote it. This means 500-1000 word articles along with infographics and other reference material. Of course that costs money.

Who will benefit from this website?

Everyone! Our content writers and other members will be contributing marketing tricks they have learned for their industry. This can cover the majority of industries. 

The Impact

Our members going out of their way to generate revenue for their articles. This will lead to readers discovering other articles and other contributors making money. The more members there are, the more everyone will cross promote each other.

Don't have any money? No problem.

Help spread the word on Twitter and Facebook. Tell anyone you know that would want to look like an authority figure of their industry on our website.

story:
Summary

Vitrum is committed to making a difference in the lives of individuals. We promote health and sustainability.  Our products are becoming a gateway for our consumers to be part of something great. Together we provide a higher quality of life for individuals around the world.


Simply stated, we sell high quality water bottles that change the world through clean well water. 
At large, nations, communities, and individuals are eager to make a difference in the world where real change and results are manifested by their efforts. Through water bottles and wells we can “make a difference” in an undeniable way.
Whether it is just one bottle, or a whole company looking to make a difference, we are here to help.  We guarantee with every single bottle purchased, the quality of life for one person goes up due to access to clean drinking water.
It may be preventing disease that would hinder you from going to school or tending your crops.  For others it is holding onto that loved one who otherwise would be lost due to disease spread through contaminated water, either way it is the world moving forward.
-Vitrum Team

Glass Bottles
There is a clear advantage in using glass as the medium for drinkware. Glass makes the ideal water bottle based on health, taste, and environmental considerations.  Aside from its potentiality to break, for which protective silicone sleeves can be added, glass bottles are safer when looked at from all angles. 
Health: Glass does not leach any type of synthetic estrogen or chemical. This was the scare leading the Food and Drug Administration to advise people against using bottles containing BPA. However other chemicals that replace BPA are still leaching similar toxins that are harmful to the human body. When exposed to natural or artificial sources of heat, plastic bottles begin to break down, exposing the water inside to contaminants.
Environment: Glass has many benefits for the environment when compared to alternative materials like metal or plastic. One of the most important is the lifespan of a glass water bottle. It is often a one-time purchase and could be recycled an infinite number of times, keeping waste out of our landfills. Glass is made primarily of sand, a natural and abundant material, that will not degrade over time. Glass water bottles can last for decades.
Functionality: Glass is transparent, aesthetically pleasing, and difficult to scratch or stain.  It can be used daily and still maintain that new look and feel. Let us not forget to mention it is dishwasher safe. Cleanliness goes a long way for our general peace of mind. 
Taste: Due to its nonporous surface, glass bottles maintain freshness and purity of taste. Other beverages (ie. sports drinks or cold tea) can be put in the bottles without residual odors or taste commonly retained in plastic or stainless steel. 


               

Above Left: Black on Black Vitrum Bottle 

Above Right: Indiegogo One time Run Africa Edition Bottle

Below : White on Silver Special Edition Bottle

    


Above: Preference A

Below: Preference B

How to Order:

We have made contributing as easy as possible, please thoroughly read through your perk and follow the directions below, 


Reaching our Goal

Any amount brought in by this campaign would make it a success.  Why $15K, its simple, with those proceeds we can build one well in Africa.  A well that will literally change lives for years and years to come.  Building 1 well is a huge success, anything after that multiplies the good we can do together.  

How many wells can we handle? It takes a lot of wells to provide water to 783,000,000 people.  There isn't hardly a number that is too high. Even the glass manufacturers can pump out 1000's of bottles a day.  We know our goal is doable, the question is how far can we exceed it?



Wells and Charities

The majority of wells constructed through Vitrum are made by using small rigs that drill about 60 meters (200 feet) into the Earth, removing and cutting through dirt and rock. A casing is inserted to keep the hole from collapsing. Next, a concrete base is formed around the casing. Once the base is dry (usually overnight) the pump mechanism can be lowered into the casing and the hand pump is installed. The team will then test the quantity and quality of the water flow.  The wells are sealed and have little to no chance of contamination.

Wells constructed in the villages of developing countries are reliable and accessible for the people who live there. Vitrum currently has agreements with charities in both Ethiopia and Malawi that will provide well construction. They are working in several communities and are waiting on funding so that they can begin well construction.  There are hundreds of locations with similar needs.


10 Years of Water

Guaranteed.  Well water is the answer for the majority of people whose only current access to water is from a contaminated source. Building wells in villages is an inclusive solution.  Wells last a long time, often up to 15 years or more.  Most wells last at least 10 years.

A well will provide clean water for hundreds of people; it can serve thousands depending on the type of well and location. We have several established charities in Africa that are excited to help us.  They already have projects ongoing in villages including education, sanitation, and clean water.  They discern where the most prevalent needs are. By partnering with these charities we are able to very quickly bring water to these villages, in most cases within a few months of selling bottles.  Each bottle sold contributes to the funds Vitrum will then use to afford materials, labor, and other building costs. The number of wells needed for each area correlates to how many people each well can serve. 

There are many organizations working to provide humanitarian aid in developing countries.  Our end goal is to create an accessible avenue for each of us to join the fight against contaminated drinking water and water related disease around the world.  

Giving is what it’s all about…

No matter what the cause has been we find that in the end, giving is what it is all about. There are several great causes to get attached to, causes that truly make the world a better place.  Ours cause is saving lives through clean water.

On that premise Vitrum was formed. As a company, it is the humanitarian effort that motivates us. Each day we are just as thankful to go to work as we are to return home. There is deep fulfillment in knowing that our work and these bottles are providing clean well water to individuals who are just as real as you and I.

Every person, whether giving or receiving,  benefits through Vitrum. These beautiful glass water bottles become the symbol of what our customers have really done for the world. We hope you think of the lives you have improved and even saved each time the glass touches your lips.

The Inspiration

Years ago while doing an internship in Pretoria, South Africa we had the privilege of replacing the ceiling of an orphanage and school.  While there, the founder of Vitrum (Kyle Nehring) was speaking with the matron of the orphanage.  While inquiring after the children's immediate needs we learned that in developing countries, especially in Africa, despite the public education system where everyone is able to learn, they often do not have any or nearly enough school supplies. 

As a volunteer teacher in Africa put it, "It is very difficult to teach the children how to write when all 10 kids at a table are sharing a single pencil without an eraser." Poverty is a real issue in developing countries.  In addition to all this there are many people that do not have their parents due to AIDS and other life threatening diseases.

  

We (Kyle and Amy) personally saved the money from the internship and bought enough school supplies for all of the children in the orphanage. Each child received pencils, erasers, pens, notebooks, a pencil sharpener, and a ruler. The day we arrived and unloaded the boxes the excitement in the air was almost tangible. In that moment we knew somehow, someday we would build a company that would be founded on giving…on changing people’s lives.  That was nearly 5 years ago, but memories like that don't fade fast, we want to continue to do good things.

  


What can you do to help

The obvious answer is to get a bottle of your own, if your finances are such that they won't allow for extra money to go out the door, not a problem, please share this with your friends and family.  Getting the word out is as important as purchasing a bottle.
All the Best,
Vitrum Team

which protective silicone sleeves can be added, glass bottles are safer when
looked at from all angles. 
Health: Glass does not leach any type of synthetic estrogen or chemical. This was the scare leading the Food and Drug Administration to advise people against using bottles containing BPA. However other chemicals that replace BPA are still leaching similar toxins that are harmful to the human body. When exposed to natural or artificial sources of heat, plastic bottles begin to break down, exposing the water inside to contaminants.

Environment: Glass has many benefits for the environment when compared to alternative materials like metal or plastic. One of the most important is the lifespan of a glass water bottle. It is often a one-time purchase and could be recycled an infinite number of times, keeping waste out of our landfills. Glass is made primarily of sand, a natural and abundant material, that will not degrade over time. Glass water bottles can last for decades.

Functionality: Glass is transparent, aesthetically pleasing, and difficult to scratch or stain.  It can be used daily and still maintain that new look and feel. Let us not forget to mention it is dishwasher safe. Cleanliness goes a long way for our general peace of mind. 

Taste: Due to its nonporous surface, glass bottles maintain freshness and purity of taste. Other beverages (ie. sports drinks or cold tea) can be put in the bottles without residual odors or taste commonly retained in plastic or stainless steel. 


               

Above Left: Black on Black Vitrum Bottle 
Above Right: Indiegogo One time Run Africa Edition Bottle
Below : White on Silver Special Edition Bottle
    




Above: Preference A
Below: Preference B






How to Order:

We have made contributing as easy as possible, please thoroughly read through your perk and follow the directions below, 





Reaching our Goal

Any amount brought in by this campaign would make it a success.  Why $15K, its simple, with those proceeds we can build one well in Africa.  A well that will literally change lives for years and years to come.  Building 1 well is a huge success, anything after that multiplies the good we can do together.  
How many wells can we handle? It takes a lot of wells to provide water to 783,000,000 people.  There isn't hardly a number that is too high. Even the glass manufacturers can pump out 1000's of bottles a day.  We know our goal is doable, the question is how far can we exceed it?




Wells and Charities


The majority of wells
constructed through Vitrum are made by using small rigs that drill about 60
meters (200 feet) into the Earth, removing and cutting through dirt and rock. A
casing is inserted to keep the hole from collapsing. Next, a concrete base is
formed around the casing. Once the base is dry (usually overnight) the pump
mechanism can be lowered into the casing and the hand pump is installed. The
team will then test the quantity and quality of the water flow.  The wells are sealed and have little to no
chance of contamination.



Wells constructed in the villages of developing
countries are reliable and accessible for the people who live there. Vitrum
currently has agreements with charities in both Ethiopia and Malawi that will
provide well construction. They are working in several communities and are
waiting on funding so that they can begin well construction.  There are hundreds of locations with similar
needs.
10 Years of Water
Guaranteed.  Well water is the answer for the majority of people whose only current access to water is from a contaminated source. Building wells in villages is an inclusive solution.  Wells last a long time, often up to 15 years or more.  Most wells last at least 10 years.
A well will provide clean water for hundreds of people; it can serve thousands depending on the type of well and location. We have several established charities in Africa that are excited to help us.  They already have projects ongoing in villages including education, sanitation, and clean water.  They discern where the most prevalent needs are. By partnering with these charities we are able to very quickly bring water to these villages, in most cases within a few months of selling bottles.  Each bottle sold contributes to the funds Vitrum will then use to afford materials, labor, and other building costs. The number of wells needed for each area correlates to how many people each well can serve. 
There are many organizations working to provide humanitarian aid in developing countries.  Our end goal is to create an accessible avenue for each of us to join the fight against contaminated drinking water and water related disease around the world.  
Giving is what it’s all about…


No matter what the cause
has been we find that in the end, giving is what it is all about. There
are several great causes to get attached to, causes that truly make the world a
better place.  Ours cause is saving lives
through clean water. 

On that premise Vitrum was
formed. As a company, it is the humanitarian effort that motivates us. Each day
we are just as thankful to go to work as we are to return home. There is deep
fulfillment in knowing that our work and these bottles are providing clean well
water to individuals who are just as real as you and I. 

Every person, whether giving or receiving,  benefits through Vitrum. These beautiful
glass water bottles become the symbol of what our customers have really done
for the world. We hope you think of the lives you have improved and even saved
each time the glass touches your lips.
The Inspiration

Years ago while doing an
internship in Pretoria, South Africa we had the privilege of replacing the
ceiling of an orphanage and school.  While there, the founder of Vitrum
(Kyle Nehring) was speaking with the matron of the orphanage.  While inquiring after the children's immediate needs we learned that in developing countries,
especially in Africa, despite the public education system where everyone is
able to learn, they often do not have any or nearly enough school supplies. 

As a volunteer teacher in
Africa put it, "It is very difficult to teach the children how to write
when all 10 kids at a table are sharing a single pencil without an
eraser." Poverty is a real issue in developing countries.  In addition to all this there are many people that do not have their parents due to AIDS
and other life threatening diseases.

  
We (Kyle and Amy) personally
saved the money from the internship and bought enough school supplies for all
of the children in the orphanage. Each child received pencils, erasers, pens,
notebooks, a pencil sharpener, and a ruler. The day we arrived and unloaded the
boxes the excitement in the air was almost tangible. In that moment we knew
somehow, someday we would build a company that would be founded on giving…on changing people’s
lives.  That was nearly 5 years ago, but memories like that don't fade fast, we want to continue to do good things.

  


What can you do to help
The obvious answer is to get a bottle of your own, if your finances are such that they won't allow for extra money to go out the door, not a problem, please share this with your friends and family.  Getting the word out is as important as purchasing a bottle.
All the Best,Vitrum Team

story:
We are a group of eager students dedicated to changing the lives of those around us and we want YOU to help!

As devoted members of Fredonia Rotaract (a subsidiary of Rotary International), we have taken on our biggest project yet- granting a child suffering from a life-threatening illness their one wish via the Make A Wish Foundation!

The Make A Wish Foundation does not only provide these children and their families with memories to cherish forever, but it also instills unparalleled feelings of inspiration, hope, and indomitable strength. 

As a club, we could not turn down the opportunity to help shed such a radiant light on these children. In order to completely fund one wish, we have been working diligently all year with various events at our college campus. 

We plan to raise most of our funds at our final event titled Courage in Motion. This inspiring event will be held at Fredonia's campus on April 25th and will consist of a dinner, testimonials from previous Make A Wish recipients, and will commence with a dance-a-thon! But, to fully achieve our goal, we need an extra push...


We need your help! 


Funding one truly deserving child's wish through the Make A Wish Foundation costs around $7,000! Achieving such a goal will not be easy, but it will be worth it! 

Every penny earned will be going directly to the Make A Wish Foundation, so YOU can help change a child's life! Any donation would be greatly appreciated!

But it doesn't end there…

Help us spread the word! Share this link with family and friends to support our goal, or attend Courage in Motion on April 25th! 

Thank you! :)

story:
Hello Potential Dream Makers!!!


My name is Melissa Quick. I am a minority business owner with wonderful ideas to build a better business dynamic for struggling entrepreneurs. I have been in the technology profession for more than a decade in various forms. The cost of business technology today is holding back too many success stories! I want to be an effective impact on the entrepreneurial community by offering QuickIT Business Districts in the cloud. 

In wanting to offer truly affordable start up options I need the capital backing of anyone that understands that all businesses can and have failed because they cannot keep up with the start-up and/or growing cost to stay in business. Cloud technology offers the opportunity to reduce business costs significantly for large and small organizations - I want to amplify that reduction even more.  A billion dollar business is just an idea if it cannot get off to a great start.

Your investment would cover development costs which will also create job opportunities for selected project staff, software, hardware and virtual server space that is BIG BUSINESS secure with a small budget focus and give opportunities to like organizations that agree to a shared cost dynamic until they can afford their own space in the QuickIT Business District.  

The funding amount I am asking for is optimal for at least 20 businesses. If I am not able to reach my funding goal - I will reduce that number to reach as many as I can. Your invaluable contribution will change the game as it puts more minority businesses in a position of success!

The rewards out weigh any risks for investors and potential QuickIT Business District clients. It is a tried and perfected paradigm many businesses are transitioning too and starting with. Cloud technology risks are weighed and argued extensively by the top professionals in the world. This is the direction the world is heading in - with this idea - things will get just that much easier! I have selected one of the most secure data centers in the world to offer optimal protection with technology.

If you are viewing this and aren't in a position to offer financial support - help spread the word about the one company on the map that truly wants to change the game in an impactful way! 

Help me make some dreams come true and make more billion dollar ideas a reality!

story:
The world is aware of the crisis that has been going on in Ukraine for the past two years.

It escalated in Eastern Ukraine (Lugansk and Donetsk region) and as a result alot of people have been internally displaced to different cities within the country.

A large number of them fled to Kharkov City for refuge but unfortunately are living in the worst conditions you can possibly imagine.

The families in this video have been helped and are currently living in a schools' dormitory but a large number of them are living in worse conditions and were too ashamed to show themselves on video.

The Maximum Living Care seeks to give gifts of destiny and hope that can make these peoples smile again.

Currently we are partnering with the Ukrainian red cross in Kharkov which is struggling to feed 45,000 people that neither have a source of income nor a roof over their head.

Some of them live in temporary shelters and abandoned buildings with their kids.

They are in need of everything you can think of(food, shelter, clothes, medications, blankets, water etc).

While we might not be able to help them all, we believe that the little you can give towards their well being will go a long way to make their lives better.

We plead with you on their behalf to please join us in giving our Ukrainian friends a gift of destiny.
