story:
Processing!


Eclipse day and the following days have been incredibly busy! As you may have seen on our updates, on the 20th March we were able to fly a helium balloon to the stratosphere from Spain, carrying a spherical camera, as well as another spherical camera on a Ultramagic hot-air balloon in Svalbard. The spherical videos are being processed. In the mean time, check out this surreal panoramic view of the eclipse from the balloon in Svalbard...

We are disappointed we weren't able to fly our balloon to space. The conditions were very difficult, the trajectory was very long making the recovery risky (and also too costly!). We decided it better to go with the safe and sure option of a flight on a hot-air balloon and a stratospheric flight in Spain only. However the good news is that we learnt a lot of things, and we hope to be able to fly next year during another total solar eclipse in Indonesia (not at the North Pole, but still spectacular...).
On the perks side, do not worry, you will get what you asked for - we are processing the spherical video, the photos, and getting your little presents ready! Stay tuned!
And it's still time to contribute! Until sunday... Thank you so much to all of you who have already contributed for your support and enthusiasm!

It's here!

The first image from the Eclipse in Svalbard just came in! Taken by David Jiménez, our eyes in the North! Just wow...
Stay tuned, much more to come!

Final push!!

It looks like we are going to be able to launch!! But we need your help! This is the current trajectory prediction for the balloon flight from Svalbard on friday during the eclipse. 

This trajectory would mean we need a helicopter to get to the launch place, but that the recovery would be pretty easy, near the town of Longyearbyen. Please help us fund this helicopter ride, so we can make this historical flight a reality! 

Share, spread the word, and let's fly!


It's getting closer!


One week left before the eclipse! The team was in the field today near Barcelona, to test the spherical camera and all other systems to make sure everything will go well! 
We are far from our goal, and the eclipse flight from Svalbard is getting very tricky!! Weather and funds are against us... But we keep on fighting! David Lazaro Jimenez of zero2infinity is almost all packed, including balloons and cameras, and will be joining the team of Ultramagic in Svalbard next week. As a back-up we will also be flying another spherical camera from Spain to catch the partial eclipse! 
We need your support more than ever!! Share with your networks, and consider adding another perk to your portfolio! You will at least get images from Svalbard, from the eclipse from the ground, and an amazing spherical video of the partial eclipse directly on your phone!!


Summary

  • We want to record the solar eclipse using a 360º spherical camera from Space using a high-altitude balloon
  • This has never been done before! The total solar eclipse is at the North Pole and it will take 500,000 years to come again. Imagine the North Pole in 500,000 years... there probably won't be ice there anymore!
  • We are experienced in high-altitude ballooning and have already taken the first ever spherical video from Space: it's quite amazing. Spherical video
  • Recovery and distribution of the images are crucial aspects of the flight and we need your help! The faster we get to our goal, the more chances we have to make this happen! Find out more below, subscribe to one of our exciting perks, and climb on board with us!

Eclipses have always been around...

On March 20th of this year there will be a Total Solar Eclipse. Sure, eclipses happen quite often. But this one’s different: the Moon’s shadow will sweep over the North Pole! That’s an event that occurs once every 500,000 years or so!

Seen from the North Pole, the Moon's apparent diameter will appear larger than the Sun itself, blocking all direct sunlight and turning day into night. This means that the Solar Eclipse will take place just as the Sun comes into view after 6 long months of polar night. How cool is that!

Total solar eclipses are only visible along a narrow band typically 100 to 400km wide. Therefore, the only populated areas where the March 20th eclipse will be visible are Svalbard and the Faroe Islands. Thanks to relatively good weather conditions, Svalbard is beyond competition regarding expected visibility. However, there’s still a very high probability of cloud cover there, threatening to take away much of the phenomena’s spectacular excitement. 

The path of the eclipse over Svalbard on 20th March 2015

...and we want to be the first to record it in HD from the stratosphere!

To get around this problem, we will record and deliver images of the arctic eclipse and its shadow from above the clouds, showing the world what an eclipse looks like from Space!

We will use our zero-emissions stratospheric balloon to carry GoPro cameras mounted on a rig to record a 360 degree spherical video at an altitude where the view of the Earth and the Sun is very similar to what astronauts experience from the International Space Station. Then, on the ground you will receive the video feed into your tablet or smart phone, being able to feel as if you were in Space – looking out your “window” to see the whole world below. 

Get an idea of what to expect by viewing this video we recorded on a previous flight over Spain: it's breath-taking! Now imagine witnessing the shadow of the Moon over the Earth...

Photo taken from a light balloon in 2009 at 27km altitude


We have been noticed...

  • "In the great race to put a tourist in space, it is just possible that the quietly confident Spaniard José Mariano López-Urdiales, whose project bloon plans to serenely float tourists 36km above the earth in pressurized capsules slung beneath giant gas balloons (no, you won’t be hanging out of a gondola), may quietly trump the bigger and noisier rocket-driven efforts of Virgin Galactic." The Daily Beast, 2014
  • "So if you've always longed to travel into space but don't want to trash the planet doing so, space ballooning is the way to go. Start saving your pocket money now. Up, up and away!" The New Scientist, 2011
  • "Other commercial operators are arguably a little eccentric, but by no means to the point of lunacy." Financial Times, How to Spend It, 2011

more...

Who are we?

Founded by Aerospace engineer José Mariano López Urdiales, zero2infinity aims at being a sustainable aerospace company. We have been launching balloons from Spain since 2009. 

“Zero” stands for zero emissions as environmental values are fundamental to the company’s mission. “Infinity” evokes the vision to elevate our planetary consciousness by taking us beyond the edge of the blue skies. We all live on one Blue Planet and it is on lease to us from future generations. We provide sustainable, enjoyable and affordable elevating experiences. Elevation, both in a physical and spiritual sense, guides our business undertaking. We are committed to inspiring not only our customers, but also employees, friends, and other stakeholders. We believe that seeing our home planet can be a life-changing experience, and that the View is best savored in the knowledge that:

  • the actual flight itself is helping preserve our home planet,
  • the technologies involved are only used for peace
  • and that the Company offering such an experience is a 21st century start-up that was founded on a vision for a more sustainable and ethical Spaceflight

We are a passion-driven output-oriented company. We direct our efforts to develop the most innovative and effective solutions, always with customer-oriented designs. We enjoy ourselves when facing the most challenging and technologically advanced problems and proposing pioneering solutions for our customers.

Right now, we fly unmanned payloads up to 40km altitude, here is the scientific website: 0ll00. The next stage in our company’s evolution will involve human flights and nanosatellite launches. Learn more about these developments at the following websites: bloon and bloostar.

The zero2infinity team at microbloon launch in may 2012, León, Spain

Check out our headquarters and what it’s like to work from here: page.

Space ballooning? That, we can do!

Our team is located in Barcelona, Spain and we have been launching balloons since 2009, from very small to very big. We have all the equipment and the knowledge needed for this flight to be a success. 

How does the usual small helium balloon flight work?

1) Watch the weather, the wind predictions and the expected trajectories

2) Choose the right launch site. This depends on where you want the balloon to land! Not on where it is prettiest or easiest...

3) Drive to the launch site, early in the morning. Pack balloons, helium bottles, parachute, cameras, batteries, thermal protection, ground cloth, ropes, tools, computer, tracking system (GPS, Iridium...), and the flight permit. 

4) Inflate the balloon, coordinate with air traffic, check all camera batteries and that all systems are "on", and... let it go.

5) Follow the path of the balloon (and have some breakfast). It takes about 2 hours for the flight to be completed.

6) Drive to the expected recovery location. When the balloon has landed, recover the payload and the parachute. 

7) Enjoy the images!

All photos taken from a light balloon campaign in Spain, September 2014, credits: zero2infinity

Recovery and distribution? We need your help!

Remember: an opportunity like this only comes around once every 500,000 years or so! Therefore, we have to make sure that we get it right the first (and only) time. Spain’s weather conditions are quite different than snowy Svalbard’s, and the balloon recovery terrain might be very hard to access. What good is it to fly a camera if we can't recover it and watch the images?

Here is where we need your help!

We’ll need your support to ensure that we get the balloon’s touchdown timing exactly right, that our camera angles are correctly set to catch the eclipse, that we have all resources to operate during polar conditions, and that we can successfully recover the cameras once they’re on the ground (keep in mind that recovery could be in water or in a very remote area only accessible by helicopter, not to mention that we also need to be prepared for any encounters with polar bears... no kidding!). 

We also want to create some amazing footage from all the images and videos recorded! This will be a more demanding job than what we are used to doing, and we'll need help for that. Finally, we'd like to involve as many people as possible for this event, so that these stunning images will be widely distributed and utilized!
The objectives of the flight are:
  • Record in HD the total solar eclipse at the North Pole - a once in 500,000 years event
  • Promote education in science, physics, astronomy and engineering
  • Create enthusiasm about the eclipse, extreme environments, northern lights, extreme ballooning and other space-related events
  • Raise further awareness about climate change : 20 to 30 years ago there was rarely open water in the northern parts of Svalbard end of March, this situation is rapidly changing with increase in temperatures. Images from the flight, and recovery operations of the balloon will enable observations of polar ice and help raise awareness of the Arctic's continuous ice melting.
We know how to fly our spherical camera in good weather conditions, using a high-altitude balloon with a parachute, tracking its flight and recovering it. We need your help to make sure that we can recover these cameras in the harsh North Pole environment where the chances are very high that the balloon will drift to an area that’s hard to access. We will need a boat, or even a helicopter – transportation means not unusual there. This could turn out to be a rather expensive affair.

Photo of a heavy balloon launch in Svalbard, credits: ISTAR Group

A typical scene of helicopter recovery on Svalbard. (Photo by Aubrey Roberts)

Ship at Isfjorden near Longyearbyen

With EUR 20,000 we can guarantee a successful recovery operation, retrieving the cameras and getting access to the video of the Total Solar Eclipse. With an additional EUR 5,000, we can post-process and render amazing footage with the recovered videos, including time-lapse videos and educational content, and widely distribute it. We will first distribute it to you, our funders, and then to other audiences as an educational resource.
Should the recovery operations turn out to be easier than expected, we will have more cash to use on additional perks to thank you, our funders! Yet if, for any reason, we fail at recovering good images of the flight, we will make it up to you! We already have some ideas and some exciting perks that will be offered to you as compensation.

The Impact

Why is this small flight so important to us? And why should it be to you? 

  • Historically, high-altitude ballooning is the best way to access Space, and we believe it has a lot to offer in the future. Our ultimate objective is to bring passengers up there. The March 20th mission is just a small step in a much larger plan. How would you like to watch the next eclipse from a balloon yourself? Witness the shadow of the Moon passing over the Earth with your own eyes? This is what we are striving to do. We have already achieved a lot. You can learn more about those plans here and here.
  • This is a completely environmentally-friendly flight to the edge of Space. It doesn't harm the atmosphere, and actually inspires people to want to protect the Earth. Such feeling is known as an “Overview Effect”, and it’s something every astronaut has experienced. We believe that showing impressive images of the Arctic region taken from Space can have a substantial impact. A gentle ascent with a balloon, for a couple of hours, and you’re already outside of our atmosphere – that thin ribbon of air that keeps us alive... Think about it!
  • For us, this is a means to engage people in what we believe in! Space doesn’t have to be expensive and far from everyday life. We want to bring Space closer and make you a part of the dream. We want to bring you with us on our adventures, give you the opportunity to launch something with us, welcome you into our workshop, and start working on this dream together! 

Photo of microbloon 2.0 taken at 32km altitude on 12 November 2012, credits: zero2infinity


Biggest Challenges

Svalbard is one of the most remote places in the world, need we say more? Recovery of the payload is definitely our biggest challenge. The good news is that launching balloons from up there is common practice. There is a big balloon launch base operational there, set up by The ISTAR Group along with the University of Rome La Sapienza, and recoveries can be organized either by boat or by helicopter. This is a short duration flight, only a couple of hours, so it should not go too far. We also have a lot of historical data and lessons learnt from previous campaigns, which will help us make this campaign successful! 

The other challenge is to record the eclipse in the best conditions and not miss the actual eclipse. To make sure we have the right footage, we will fly a spherical camera we built ourselves, made up of 6 GoPro Cameras! It films 360 degrees, so no angle is left uncovered!

The spherical camera. Photo credits: Cristóbal Castro - El País
Thanks to our magical graphics and video guy (and also one of our mechanical engineers...), David Lázaro Jimenez, we will make sure to have an amazing video to show you!

As stated earlier: if, for any reason, the flight is unsuccessful, and we are not able to deliver the video of the eclipse to you, we will make it up to you. Images from Near-Space are always breath-taking, and we will organize another flight just for you! 


To find out more...

  • "What you are doing is magnificent", Richard Branson, Slow Life Symposium 2011
  • "The dawn of commercial flights to space is drawing nearer. While Richard Branson's Virgin Galactic service has been besieged by delays, Spanish company Zero2Infinity is soon to launch “near-space flights” on board a zero-emission craft called bloon." The Telegraph, 2014
  • "Ultimately there will be room for both balloons and rockets, with some customers seeking the “I survived it” experience of a rocket, while others will prefer the safer, longer and cheaper trip in a balloon." Arabian Business, 2014
  • and many more....


Sponsors

We are grateful to our partners in this adventure:



And for the image of the eclipse in the video:

Copyright © 2009-2015 Ryuunosuke Takeshige All Rights Reserved.

Background data © European Southern Observatory:ESO contributors, CC BY 3.0 (Id:eso0932a)


Other Ways You Can Help

You love the idea but cannot help fund it? No problem, help us by sharing the word with your friends, family, work colleagues, and university networks! You can use the following share tools:

We decided it better to go with the safe and sure option of a flight on a hot-air balloon and a stratospheric flight in Spain only. However the good news is that we learnt a lot of things, and we hope to be able to fly next year during another total solar eclipse in Indonesia (not at the North Pole, but still spectacular...).
On the perks side, do not worry, you will get what you asked for - we are processing the spherical video, the photos, and getting your little presents ready! Stay tuned!
And it's still time to contribute! Until sunday... Thank you so much to all of you who have already contributed for your support and enthusiasm!
It's here!

The first image from the Eclipse in Svalbard just came in! Taken by David Jiménez, our eyes in the North! Just wow...
Stay tuned, much more to come!
Final push!!

It looks like we are going to be able to launch!! But we need your help! This is the current trajectory prediction for the balloon flight from Svalbard on friday during the eclipse. 


This trajectory would mean we need a helicopter to get to the launch place, but that the recovery would be pretty easy, near the town of Longyearbyen. Please help us fund this helicopter ride, so we can make this historical flight a reality! 
Share, spread the word, and let's fly!


It's getting closer!



One week left before the eclipse! The team was in the field today near Barcelona, to test the spherical camera and all other systems to make sure everything will go well! 
We are far from our goal, and the eclipse flight from Svalbard is getting very tricky!! Weather and funds are against us... But we keep on fighting! David Lazaro Jimenez of zero2infinity is almost all packed, including balloons and cameras, and will be joining the team of Ultramagic in Svalbard next week. As a back-up we will also be flying another spherical camera from Spain to catch the partial eclipse! 
We need your support more than ever!! Share with your networks, and consider adding another perk to your portfolio! You will at least get images from Svalbard, from the eclipse from the ground, and an amazing spherical video of the partial eclipse directly on your phone!!




Summary


We want to record the solar eclipse using a 360º spherical camera from Space using a high-altitude balloon


This has never been done before! The total solar eclipse is at the North Pole and it will take 500,000 years to come again. Imagine the North Pole in 500,000 years... there probably won't be ice there anymore!

We are experienced in high-altitude ballooning and have already taken the first ever spherical video from Space: it's quite amazing. Spherical video
Recovery and distribution of the images are crucial aspects of the flight and we need your help! The faster we get to our goal, the more chances we have to make this happen! Find out more below, subscribe to one of our exciting perks, and climb on board with us!

Eclipses have always been around... 
On March 20th
of this year there will be a Total Solar Eclipse. Sure, eclipses happen quite
often. But this one’s different: the Moon’s shadow will sweep over the North
Pole! That’s an event that occurs once every 500,000 years or so! 
Seen from the North
Pole, the Moon's apparent diameter will appear larger than the Sun itself,
blocking all direct sunlight and turning day into night. This means that the
Solar Eclipse will take place just as the Sun comes into view after 6 long
months of polar night. How cool is that!
Total solar eclipses
are only visible along a narrow band typically 100 to 400km wide. Therefore, the
only populated areas where the March 20th eclipse will be visible
are Svalbard and the Faroe Islands. Thanks to relatively good weather conditions,
Svalbard is beyond competition regarding expected visibility. However, there’s still
a very high probability of cloud cover there, threatening to take away much of the
phenomena’s spectacular excitement. 




   
The path of the eclipse over Svalbard on 20th March 2015
...and we want to be the first to record it in HD from the stratosphere!


To get around this
problem, we will record and deliver images of the arctic eclipse and its shadow
from above the clouds, showing the world what an eclipse looks like from Space!
We will use our
zero-emissions stratospheric balloon to carry GoPro cameras mounted on a rig to
record a 360 degree spherical video at an altitude where the view of the Earth
and the Sun is very similar to what astronauts experience from the
International Space Station. Then, on the ground you will receive the video
feed into your tablet or smart phone, being able to feel as if you were in
Space – looking out your “window” to see the whole world below. 

Get an idea of what to expect by viewing this video we recorded on a previous flight over Spain: it's breath-taking! Now imagine witnessing the shadow of the Moon over the Earth...



Photo taken from a light balloon in 2009 at 27km altitude


We have been noticed...



"In the great race to put a tourist in space, it is just possible that the quietly confident Spaniard José Mariano López-Urdiales, whose project bloon plans to serenely float tourists 36km above the earth in pressurized capsules slung beneath giant gas balloons (no, you won’t be hanging out of a gondola), may quietly trump the bigger and noisier rocket-driven efforts of Virgin Galactic." The Daily Beast, 2014

"So if you've always longed to travel into space but don't want to trash the planet doing so, space ballooning is the way to go. Start saving your pocket money now. Up, up and away!" The New Scientist, 2011


"Other commercial operators are arguably a little eccentric, but by no means to the point of lunacy." Financial Times, How to Spend It, 2011





more...

Who are we?

Founded by Aerospace engineer José Mariano López Urdiales, zero2infinity aims at being a sustainable aerospace company. We have been launching balloons from Spain since 2009. 




“Zero” stands for zero emissions as environmental values are fundamental to the company’s mission. “Infinity” evokes the vision to elevate our planetary consciousness by taking us beyond the edge of the blue skies. We all live on one Blue Planet and it is on lease to us from future generations. We provide sustainable, enjoyable and affordable elevating experiences. Elevation, both in a physical and spiritual sense, guides our business undertaking. We are committed to inspiring not only our customers, but also employees, friends, and other stakeholders. We believe that seeing our home planet can be a life-changing experience, and that the View is best savored in the knowledge that:

the actual flight itself is helping preserve our home planet,
the technologies involved are only used for peace
and that the Company offering such an experience is a 21st century start-up that was founded on a vision for a more sustainable and ethical Spaceflight

We are a passion-driven output-oriented company. We direct our efforts to develop the most innovative and effective solutions, always with customer-oriented designs. We enjoy ourselves when facing the most challenging and technologically advanced problems and proposing pioneering solutions for our customers.Right now, we fly unmanned payloads up to 40km altitude, here is the scientific website: 0ll00. 
The next stage in our company’s evolution will involve
human flights and nanosatellite launches. Learn more about these developments
at the following websites: bloon and bloostar.



The zero2infinity team at microbloon launch in may 2012, León, Spain


Check out our headquarters and what it’s like to
work from here: page.

Space ballooning? That, we can do!
Our team is located in Barcelona, Spain and we have been launching balloons since 2009, from very small to very big. We have all the equipment and the knowledge needed for this flight to be a success. 
How does the usual small helium balloon flight work?
1) Watch the weather, the wind predictions and the expected trajectories


2) Choose the right launch site. This depends on where you want the balloon to land! Not on where it is prettiest or easiest...



3) 
Drive to the launch site, early in the morning. Pack
balloons, helium bottles, parachute, cameras, batteries, thermal protection,
ground cloth, ropes, tools, computer, tracking system (GPS, Iridium...), and
the flight permit. 



4) Inflate the balloon, coordinate with air traffic, check all camera batteries and that all systems are "on", and... let it go.



5) Follow the path of the balloon (and have some breakfast). It takes about 2 hours for the flight to be completed.



6) Drive to the expected recovery location. When the balloon has landed, recover the payload and the parachute. 


7) Enjoy the images!


All photos taken from a light balloon campaign in Spain, September 2014, credits: zero2infinity
Recovery and distribution? We need your help!

Remember: an opportunity like this only comes around
once every 500,000 years or so! Therefore, we have to make sure that we get it
right the first (and only) time. Spain’s weather conditions are quite different
than snowy Svalbard’s, and the balloon recovery terrain might be very hard to
access. What good is it to fly a camera if we can't recover it and watch the
images?


Here is where we need
your help!
We’ll need your
support to ensure that we get the balloon’s touchdown timing exactly right, that
our camera angles are correctly set to catch the eclipse, that we have all
resources to operate during polar conditions, and that we can successfully
recover the cameras once they’re on the ground (keep in mind that recovery
could be in water or in a very remote area only accessible by helicopter, not
to mention that we also need to be prepared for any encounters with polar bears...
no kidding!). 

We also want to create some amazing footage from all the images and videos recorded! This will be a more demanding job than what we are used to doing, and we'll need help for that. Finally, we'd like to involve as many people as possible for this event, so that these stunning images will be widely distributed and utilized!
The objectives of the flight are:

Record in HD the total solar eclipse at the North Pole - a once in 500,000 years event
Promote education in science, physics, astronomy and engineering
Create enthusiasm about the eclipse, extreme environments, northern lights, extreme ballooning and other space-related events
Raise further awareness about climate change : 20 to 30 years ago there was rarely open water in the northern parts of Svalbard end of March, this situation is rapidly changing with increase in temperatures. Images from the flight, and recovery operations of the balloon will enable observations of polar ice and help raise awareness of the Arctic's continuous ice melting.


We know how to fly our spherical camera in good weather
conditions, using a high-altitude balloon with a parachute, tracking its flight
and recovering it. We need your help to make sure that we can recover these
cameras in the harsh North Pole environment where the chances are very high
that the balloon will drift to an area that’s hard to access. We will need a
boat, or even a helicopter – transportation means not unusual there. This could
turn out to be a rather expensive affair.

Photo of a heavy balloon launch in Svalbard, credits: ISTAR Group


A typical scene of helicopter recovery on Svalbard. (Photo by Aubrey Roberts)



Ship at Isfjorden near Longyearbyen

With EUR 20,000 
we can guarantee a successful recovery operation,
retrieving the cameras and getting access to the video of the Total Solar Eclipse.
With an additional EUR 5,000, we can post-process and render amazing footage
with the recovered videos, including time-lapse videos and educational content,
and widely distribute it. We will first distribute it to you, our funders, and
then to other audiences as an educational resource.

Should the recovery operations turn out to be
easier than expected, we will have more cash to use on additional perks to
thank you, our funders! Yet if, for any reason, we fail at recovering good
images of the flight, we will make it up to you! We already have some ideas and
some exciting perks that will be offered to you as compensation.
   The Impact Why is this small flight so important to us? And why should it be to you?   
Historically, high-altitude ballooning is the best
way to access Space, and we believe it has a lot to offer in the future. Our
ultimate objective is to bring passengers up there. The March 20th
mission is just a small step in a much larger plan. How would you like to watch the next eclipse from a balloon yourself? Witness the shadow of the Moon passing over the Earth with your own eyes? This is what we are striving to do. We have already achieved a lot. You can learn more about those plans here and here.
This is a completely environmentally-friendly flight to the edge of Space. It doesn't harm the atmosphere, and actually inspires people to want to protect the Earth. 
Such feeling is known as an “Overview Effect”, and
it’s something every astronaut has experienced. We believe that showing
impressive images of the Arctic region taken from Space can have a substantial
impact. A gentle ascent with a balloon, for a couple of hours, and you’re already
outside of our atmosphere – that thin ribbon of air that keeps us alive...
Think about it!

For us, this is a means to engage people in what we
believe in! Space doesn’t have to be expensive and far from everyday life. We
want to bring Space closer and make you a part of the dream. We want to bring
you with us on our adventures, give you the opportunity to launch something
with us, welcome you into our workshop, and start working on this dream
together!  



Photo of microbloon 2.0 taken at 32km altitude on 12 November 2012, credits: zero2infinity
   
Biggest Challenges  Svalbard is one of the most remote places in the world, need we say more? Recovery of the payload is definitely our biggest challenge. The good news is that launching balloons from up there is common practice. There is a big balloon launch base operational there, set up by The ISTAR Group along with the University of Rome La Sapienza, and recoveries can be organized either by boat or by helicopter. This is a short duration flight, only a couple of hours, so it should not go too far. We also have a lot of historical data and lessons learnt from previous campaigns, which will help us make this campaign successful! 
The other challenge is to record the eclipse in the best conditions and not miss the actual eclipse. To make sure we have the right footage, we will fly a spherical camera we built ourselves, made up of 6 GoPro Cameras! It films 360 degrees, so no angle is left uncovered!


The spherical camera. Photo credits: Cristóbal Castro - El País Thanks to our magical graphics and video guy (and also one of our mechanical engineers...), David Lázaro Jimenez, we will make sure to have an amazing video to show you!


As stated earlier: if, for any reason, the flight is unsuccessful, and we are not able to deliver the video of the eclipse to you, we will make it up to you. Images from Near-Space are always breath-taking, and we will organize another flight just for you! 
  
To find out more...


"What you are doing is magnificent", Richard Branson, Slow Life Symposium 2011


"The dawn of commercial flights to space is drawing nearer. While Richard Branson's Virgin Galactic service has been besieged by delays, Spanish company Zero2Infinity is soon to launch “near-space flights” on board a zero-emission craft called bloon." The Telegraph, 2014


"Ultimately there will be room for both balloons and rockets, with some customers seeking the “I survived it” experience of a rocket, while others will prefer the safer, longer and cheaper trip in a balloon." Arabian Business, 2014


and many more....






Sponsors
We are grateful to our partners in this adventure:





And for the image of the eclipse in the video:Copyright © 2009-2015 Ryuunosuke Takeshige All Rights Reserved.
Background data © European Southern Observatory:ESO contributors, CC BY 3.0 (Id:eso0932a)


Other Ways You Can Help You love the idea but cannot help fund it? No problem, help us by sharing the word with your friends, family, work colleagues, and university networks! You can use the following share tools:

story:
Our mission is to empower you through what you already do, join us and change everything!

Why: Simply put “We Love Riders & Horses!" 

How We Do It? “We Validate the Value You Create… You’re the Talent, Equetica Proves It”

The Story of Our Project

Hello! I am here to tell you about my company launching a brand new service called Equetica.

Riders are passionate and devoted to the animals they love.  Each year they give thousands of hours in hard training time and emotional energy, not to mention the financial resources. All these elements are needed and integral to the continued success of the industry and supporting businesses. 

We developed Equetica in order to unify the equestrian market.  Currently horse owners, riders, trainers, shows, farriers, veterinarians, suppliers, insurance companies, buyers, sellers and farms all operate independently of each other; even though they affect each others outcome. This disconnect creates monetary pitfalls and large consumptions of time and resources to navigate.

Have you ever thought about how to bridge the gap between all the different components in the equestrian industry?

Do you want to join this movement connecting all industry partners to benefit everybody, but don’t know how?

Are you interested in being part of our team?

If you answered, “Yes” to any of these questions, you may want to keep reading…

More about the Project

Equetica has developed a new and proven method of data aggregation, intelligence, and predictive modeling. This proprietary platform will provide all participants in the industry the ability to reduce the money, time, and resources by having access to the intelligence we produce. 

We feel if executed properly we can reach a large market of people in need of an easier way to do business in the equestrian industry.  Our proprietary components will make us incredibly qualified to succeed in the equestrian industry.  This paired with attention to detail and quality service will make us a key player, if not the leader in the equestrian industry. Our mission is to take care of every supporter with the utmost respect and care. 

About Me & Why I am Doing This

I Colin Schnebly, Founder of Equetica have never been officially in the equestrian industry, but I’ve experienced and witnessed many aspects of its wonder. I’m married to a hunter jumper who has ridden for thirty-five years. I have seen her go to bed at mid-night preparing her horse and equipment for the next day’s competition, then getting up at 4am to start the competition which last all day long.

I have always admired and was a bit jealous of this love for this industry she exhibits. Over the years I developed a respect for the riders prompting me to become a champion for their cause.  Now I’m starting to ride and understand the addiction. As a result of my experience of building a technology based company for national corporations to manage and gain control of their facility operations through intelligence, I saw a glaring parallel with the equestrian industry.

The Experience

We will build a dedicated audience of horse enthusiast by providing an interactive environment. Equetica is the new way of information management, a technology company optimizing data intelligence.  We leverage data in the equestrian market to substantially reduce time and costs.

Empower yourself!  Without historical information personal assumptions and desires will make your decisions. Knowledge is power; Equetica is your gateway to intelligence. 

The Future of The Platform ...

Most of you have accounts with Facebook, YouTube, Twitter, Google + and many other social media platforms.  There is a common thread between all these, communication and that is about it.  They limit or control the content you can display about who you are and don't help you grow as an individual.   

Currently, everyone  expects you to enter your information  into their systems, which is useful for their revenue, not yours. 

Aren't you sick of everyone else taking your information and benefiting from it, except you?  The individual never seems to advance personally from technology, only big corporations.  Donate as much as you can and change how individuals can grow by tracking what they already do! 

The equestrian industry will be the first to change social media forever and you can be apart of it! 

We have proven this model can increase success by 30% or more.  What are you waiting for?  Help us, help you!   Contribute and receive a great gift.  Our t-shirts and hats are top of the line, but our most unique gift is the personal app which is explained a little more below.   

Phase One

Our first phase has been completed, allowing individuals to have their own personal apps.  Have you ever seen anyone have their own personal app?  No, because it would cost $10’s, if not $100’s of thousands to create.  We are offering only 200 personal and 70 business apps as a reward for contributing to our cause.  Imagine being 1 of only 200 people in the world having their own personal app that can be saved and shared on anyone’s mobile device to reference you at any given moment. 

Please scan the QR code into your mobile device and view our example of what could be your own personal app.  Develop your story and share it with everyone and promote your own personal QR code directing them to your app.

Click here and see our example web version: The app on the web

What a business can do:  Tutorial Business App

What a individual can do:  Tutorial Personal App

Empower yourself!  Without historical information personal assumptions and desires will make your decisions. Knowledge is power; Equetica is your gateway to intelligence.

If you are someone who likes to grow, constantly seek to improve yourself, then welcome home to Equetica.  Our vision is to provide individuals with knowledge to greatly enhance their capabilities.

How You Can Help

For us to bring “Equetica” to life, we need your support!

Equetica is currently seeking enthusiastic and progressive contributors.  The following is what we need to accomplish and will require help from you to fund:

·  Core Software Applications: Mobile Application/Social Media Application/Graphic User Interface

·  Software & Platform Refinement

·  Software Quality Assurance   

·  Database Design and Development 

·  Roll-Out to Strategic Partners and Download for Consumers

·  Marketing: Establish consistent brand building

We will also be using the funding to expand the possibilities to further customize the first version of Equetica and create additional products and services.  If you think you love your phone now, then Equetica will bring you to a new level of utopia and your hand held devices will have a complete different meaning in the near future! 

Equetica needs pledging, but above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this movement as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page). Help us spread the word and get things started!

Final Thank You and Links

We feel so grateful to everyone who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve. 

You are part of our “Equetica” family.

If you cannot donate but you are interested in helping, please contact us so we can set you up with a referral program! You might even be able to earn perks, just by spreading the word!

YOU’RE THE TALENT, WE JUST PROVE IT!

story:
What is GadgetBox?

At GadgetBox, we discovered that the number of entrepreneurs who launch their products is increasing at a very rapid pace. As a result of this, consumers are not able to fully experience and engage in new products and technology that is swarming the globe. In order to resolve this we created GadgetBox. GadgetBox help both sides of the equation (consumers and entrepreneurs) close the gap and be connected more directly.

We aim to close the gap between household consumers and entrepreneurs using our unique subscription service. We allow entrepreneurs to gain maximum exposure for their product(s) through our subscription based service that sends "boxes" to household consumers on either a monthly, quarterly, or yearly basis. These so called "boxes" will contain a certain amount of gadgets that will be received by the consumer via postal mail. They will not be randomized entrepreneur produced products. These entrepreneur based products will be hand picked by the GadgetBox team in order to match the preferences of the consumer as closely as possible. We have a technique made specifically to allow us to garner greater insight regarding the preferences of the consumer. These products in the boxes will be provided by the entrepreneur, therefore allowing household consumers to be aware of the new innovations created by these entrepreneurs. The entrepreneurs do not have to pay a dime. Instead, GadgetBox will give a commission to the entrepreneurs who provide the products. It will be a profit for the entrepreneur as well. This subscription based service vastly mitigates the dilemma that entrepreneurs face when they want to properly expose their products to household consumers. Through GadgetBox, entrepreneurs of any age will be able to more efficiently expose their products and at the same time, household consumers like me and you will be able to discover the new gadgets and products that are making life easier all over the globe.

(Entrepreneurs also benefit because they receive a commission on top of receiving exposure to their products. The more product that are provided to GadgetBox, the higher the commission.)



The GadgetBox Website

-Through our website, entrepreneurs and household consumers will be able to create a free account and consumers will be able to subscribe to our service. Just look for the Sign Up button located on the top right

-You will also be able to subscribe by clicking the Subscribe button on the top bar, or any other subscribe button that you will see scattered around our site

-Entrepreneurs will be able to create their own account and easily register their product(s) with us.

-Be up to date with our latest updates and newest products by visiting our weekly blog

-We will also have an online store that you will be able to shop from if you would like to

-You will be able to send our subscription boxes as a gift to your friends or family too. It is the same procedure as subscribing for yourself, except your gift will be given to the other person as a surprise at their doorstep!

-Through your profile you will be able to keep track of the products your receive and also be able to edit any of your information or subscription plan if necessary

-Finally, you will receive points. Each month you receive your box, you will accumulate a specific amount of points. If you purchase from our online store then even more points will be accumulated. You will be able to use those points to choose a free gift provided by GadgetBox or use them to shop on our store instead of using credit.

*(gadgetbox.us) >Currently, our website is in its final stages and we plan to update our store as soon as the finishing touches are made!



Who's Creating GadgetBox?

We are Rishi Patel and Kirtan Barot. We are two everyday university students who are ambitious and passionate about the rapidly developing tech world. We met at university and discovered that we both had a passion for technology and business, and wanted to share that passion with the world. After speaking with many new and experienced entrepreneurs and after attending many technology exhibitions, we found that the connection between consumers and entrepreneurs was not fully efficient. We went on to distribute a survey regarding this issue  and the results of the survey were the same---consumers were not fully exposed to new and innovative entrepreneurial products and entrepreneurs were not efficiently  engaging with consumers. We took a stance to mitigate and resolve this issue and thus GadgetBox was born. 





What's in the Box?

The subscription box that is received on a monthly, quarterly or yearly basis (Depending on the subscription plan you choose) will include unique and innovative tech/design gadgets. It can be anything from newly designed & sound efficient wireless headphones to a 3D printing pen to a Smart Lightbulb and so on. The box full of gadgets that will arrive at your home will contain anywhere between 2-6 gadgets/products (Once again, the amount of products received will depend on the subscription plan that you choose)

What Do Others Say?

We have received many positive response and feedback from prospective clients and from a survey that we launched a few months back. Here are just a few of the responses:

"I think that it is an amazing service that really helps you put into perspective the true benefits of electronics and technology. Truly amazing."--Paula B.

"It's a great opportunity for entrepreneurs and small business owners to really take their product to the next level in terms of exposure. Really something out of the ordinary."--Kevin P.

"If you like technology then this is definitely for you."--Kurt B.

MISCELLANEOUS 

*You can sign-up on our email list to receive the latest updates and for a chance to win a year's worth of subscription boxes! 

*Click the link here to join our email list: http://gadgetbox.launchrock.com/


*(You can send a tweet or send a private message through Indiegogo for any questions or comments. Thank You!)
story_txt: What is GadgetBox?At GadgetBox, we discovered that the number of entrepreneurs who launch their products is increasing at a very rapid pace. As a result of this, consumers are not able to fully experience and engage in new products and technology that is swarming the globe. In order to resolve this we created GadgetBox. GadgetBox help both sides of the equation (consumers and entrepreneurs) close the gap and be connected more directly. We aim to close the gap between household consumers and entrepreneurs using our unique subscription service. We allow entrepreneurs to gain maximum exposure for their product(s) through our subscription based service that sends "boxes" to household consumers on either a monthly, quarterly, or yearly basis. These so called "boxes" will contain a certain amount of gadgets that will be received by the consumer via postal mail. They will not be randomized entrepreneur produced products. These entrepreneur based products will be hand picked by the GadgetBox team in order to match the preferences of the consumer as closely as possible.  We have a technique made specifically to allow us to garner greater insight regarding the preferences of the consumer. These products in the boxes will be provided by the entrepreneur, therefore allowing household consumers to be aware of the new innovations created by these entrepreneurs. The entrepreneurs do not have to pay a dime. Instead, GadgetBox will give a commission  to the entrepreneurs who provide the products. It will be a profit for the entrepreneur as well. This subscription based service vastly mitigates the dilemma that entrepreneurs face when they want to properly expose their products to household consumers. Through GadgetBox, entrepreneurs of any age will be able to more efficiently expose their products and at the same time, household consumers like me and you will be able to discover the new gadgets and products that are  making life easier all over the globe. (Entrepreneurs also benefit because they receive a commission on top of receiving exposure to their products. The more product that are provided to GadgetBox, the higher the commission.)  The GadgetBox Website-Through our website, entrepreneurs and household consumers will be able to create a free account and consumers will be able to subscribe to our service. Just look for the Sign Up button located on the top right-You will also be able to subscribe by clicking the Subscribe button on the top bar, or any other subscribe button that you will see scattered around our site-Entrepreneurs will be able to create their own account and easily register their product(s) with us.-Be up to date with our latest updates and newest products by visiting our weekly blog-We will also have an online store that you will be able to shop from if you would like to-You will be able to send our subscription boxes as a gift to your friends or family too. It is the same procedure as subscribing for yourself, except your gift will be given to the other person as a surprise at their doorstep!-Through your profile you will be able to keep track of the products your receive and also be able to edit any of your information or subscription plan if necessary -Finally, you will receive points. story:
Dans le cadre d'une association de soutien aux entrepreneurs dont nous faisons partie, nous avons été confrontés à deux problématiques :

-  La première : Des entrepreneurs et artistes ayant besoin de locaux ponctuellement

-  La seconde : Des sociétés ou des structures ayant des espaces disponibles et non utilisés

C'est pourquoi nous avons décidé de monter ce projet

PRINCIPE DU PROJET

Nous vous proposons une plateforme web de réservation afin de mettre en relation des sociétés ou structure disposant d’espace de travail disponible, sur laquelle trouver son espace de travail idéal en toute flexibilité et ponctuel. En toute simplicité, vous sélectionnez, cliquez  et c'est réservé.

Nous vous proposons plusieurs types d'espace de travail, selon vos attentes vous trouverez des bureaux indépendants,  partagés que ce soit par des entreprises, des espaces de coworking, des incubateurs et des salles de réunion, des boutiques éphémères, des espaces d’expositions à louer à l’heure, la journée à ou plus.

Si le système de dons ne vous satisfait pas ! nous vous proposons d'investir dans ce projet. Pour 500 € investi devenez actionnaire de 1% de Clevoff et participez ainsi à sa création et à son développement


COMMENT CA MARCHE

Vous avez un bien à louer ?



Économique et convivial : partagez vos espaces non utilisés car ils vous coutent de l’argent

1)  Transmettez nous votre annonce 

-  Type de bien

-  Vos coordonnées

-  Période de disponibilité

-  Prix

-  Photos de l’espace

-  Prestations (Internet, Photocopieurs, Retropojecteur,etc..)

Votre annonce sera référencée sur notre site internet et diffusée sur les réseaux sociaux.

2)  Vos locataires réservent et paient en ligne 

Vos locataires réservent et paient en ligne sur Clevoff.fr, et vous êtes automatiquement prévenu par mail

3)  Recevez votre argent

Après confirmation de la disponibilité de la location de votre part, vous recevrez sous 48 heures votre virement.


Vous recherchez un bien ?

Simple et économique : réservez facilement votre espace en ligne en toute confiance. Même en dernière minute !

1)  Recherchez votre espace

Sélectionnez votre type d’espace, entrez la ville de votre choix, vos dates. Consultez le profil vérifié des annonceurs: avis et type d’annonceurs (activité de la société, prestations fournis, etc..)

2)  Réservez par Carte bancaire ou virement

Vous réservez votre place avec une Carte Bancaire par paiement sécurisé et recevez un Code de Réservation. L’annonceur est prévenu immédiatement par nos soins.

3)  Faites nous un retour de votre expérience

Après l’utilisation faites nous un feedback de votre location, cela nous permettra de vous offrir un service toujours plus performant et de qualité.


QUELS SONT NOS BESOINS ET QUE PROPOSONS-NOUS ?

Actuellement, nous sommes en pleine prospection d annonceurs, notre site internet est bientôt terminé, les statuts sont prêts.

Nous vous proposons :

-  Pour 1 € : Vous nous appréciez! Merci, chaque euro compte !

-  Pour  10 € : Une invitation au lancement

-  Pour  25 € : Une invitation au lancement et un mug avec votre nom et votre nom affiché sur notre page de remerciement.

-  Pour  100 € : une invitation au lancement et  une bouteille de champagne et votre nom affiché sur notre page de remerciement.

- Pour 500 € et plus : l'invitation, votre nom avec mention spéciale et  le trophée de super contributeur

D'autres façons d'aider

Vous ne pouvez  pas contribuer mais vous souhaitez nous aider ?

  • Faites de la publicité autour de notre projet, parlez en atour de vous
  • Utiliser les outils de partage Indiegogo, pour partager notre projet sur les réseaux sociaux

Nous sollicitons cette somme pour permettre :

  • la mise ne place de notre campagne marketing
  • de permettre un effet levier afin d'obtenir d'autres financements pour permettre un développement optimal et technologique.


As part of a support association for entrepreneurs which we belong, we were faced with two problems:

- First: Entrepreneurs and artists who need local punctually

- Second: Companies or structures with available spaces and unused

That is why we decided to set up this project

THE PROJECT
 

We offer a web booking platform to bring together companies or structure with working space available in which to find her ideal work space in a flexible and punctual. Quite simply, you select, click and it's booked.

 
We offer several types of workspace according to your expectations you will find independent offices, whether shared by companies, coworking spaces, incubators and meeting rooms, ephemeral boutiques, exhibition spaces for rent by the hour, day or longer.

 

If the donation system you are not satisfied! we suggest you to invest in this project. To become a shareholder invested € 500 1% Clevoff and thus participate in its creation and its development



HOW IT WORKS

 

 You have a workspace to rent?

 

Economic and easy: share your unused space because they cost you money

 

 Send us your ad

 Workspace type
 Your details
 Availability period
 Price
 Space photos
 Services (Internet, Photocopier, Projector, etc ..)

 

Your ad will be registered on our website and broadcast on social networks.

 

 Your tenants book and pay online

 

Your tenants book and pay online Clevoff.fr, and you are automatically notified by mail

 

 Get your money

 

After confirming the availability of the rental on your part, you will receive your payment within 48 hours.

 

 

 Looking for workspace?

 

Simple and economical: easily book your online space with confidence. Even last minute!

 

 Search your space

 

Select your type of space, enter the desired city, dates. See profile checked advertisers: Notice and type of advertisers (business of the company, services provided, etc. ..)

 

 Book by credit card or bank transfer

 

You book your place with a secure payment by Credit Card and receive a reservation code. The advertiser is notified immediately by us.

 

 Let us return to your experience

 

After using let us feedback of your rental, will allow us to offer you an even better service and quality.

 

WHAT ARE OUR NEEDS AND WHAT DO WE OFFER?

 

Currently, we are in prospecting advertisers, our website is nearing completion, the articles are ready.

 

We offer:

 

 1 €: You we enjoy! Thank you, every euro counts!

 

 For 10 €: An invitation to the launch, your name displayed on our thanks.

 

 For 25 €: An invitation to the launch, a mug and your name displayed on our thanks.

 

 For 100 €: an invitation to the launch and a bottle of champagne and your name displayed on our thanks.

 For 500 € and more: the invitations, with special mention your name and the contributor trophy
or
To become a shareholder invested € 500 1% Clevoff and thus participate in its creation and its development

Other ways to help

You can not help but want to help us?

 Advertise around our project, speak in waiting of you
 
 Use Indiegogo sharing tools, sharing our project on social networks



 the setting will place our marketing campaign
 allow leverage to obtain additional financing to allow optimal and technological development.

story:
NRG MicroShots Are HandCrafted 5ml Micro Energy Shots That Taste Great And Deliver 2-3 Hours Of Natural Uplifting Energy - No Jitters, No Crash. Made With Natural Ingredients In The USA.

Our Story

Hi, my name is Patricia McCabe, and I’m the co-creator of NRG MicroShots, along with my partner and husband Matt McCabe. This campaign is important to us because we need your help. We have the kind of product that needs to go big in order to make it. We need to be able to produce NRG MicroShots in larger quantities, and with some product variations, to be successful. This can be done with the help of your support in funding our project.

Our business is family owned and operated - my husband and I have four active children all between the ages of 6 and 19 years old – and we are literally building it from the ground up. NRG MicroShots stem from an old family recipe, on my mom’s side, for apple cider. The recipe calls for ingredients like cinnamon, orange, clove, apple, “secret” spices, apple cider vinegar, and honey.

We also incorporate energy supplement ingredients like natural caffeine from real coffee beans, taurine, n-acetyl, l-tyrosine, and vitamins B3, B6, and B12:
  • Vitamin B Complex - Essential to maintain a healthy nervous system, raise good cholesterol, and increase metabolism.
  • Natural Caffeine - Keeps us alert and awake, reduces the risk of heart disease and diabetes, and is an effective antioxidant.
  • Taurine - Essential for cardiovascular function, development and function of skeletal muscle, and the central nervous system.
  • N-Acetyl L-Tyrosine - Improves brain function and increases mental alertness.

All the ingredients come together nicely, allowing us to create an energy drink that works great, tastes great, and makes your body feel great – it’s a 5ml micro energy shot that delivers hours of energy.

  • 1 NRG MicroShot has as much caffeine as 1 cup of coffee and provides hours of energy - 130mg.
  • Fast acting with more control over when and how much energy is delivered.
  • No carbohydrates and only 7 calories per serving.
  • No jitters and no sugar crash.

Here is what's being said about NRG MicroShots:

Impact of NRG MicroShots

I believe that we have created an awesome product that so many people can benefit from and enjoy - those who may be interested in energy shots, but don’t like the typically chalky or medicinal taste, the 2oz size, or the inconsistent effectiveness of other energy shots.

NRG MicroShots taste great. They come in a small 5ml flip-top cylinder and provide hours of energy that feel natural to the body - no jitters, no shakes. We're on to something and need your help to take it to the next level.

We Need $76K In Funding To...

  • Move our business into a larger warehouse that's located in Santa Cruz, California – a short distance from where we are now, (Cost, $35K annually, including utilities)
  • Purchase commercial product filling and packaging machines. Although our product is handcrafted – our NRG MicroShots are blended by hand, with skill and attention to detail – we need equipment to help us expedite the filling and packaging of larger orders made by retailers and distributors. (Cost, $25K)
  • Increase our quantities of NRG MicroShot ingredients such as natural caffeine, taurine, vitamins B3, B6, B12, and so on, along with purchasing more production and packaging materials. (Cost, $10K to start)
  • Promote NRG MicroShots to the public. We want to reach out and talk to as many people as possible about this great product so we need to start an advertising budget. (Cost, $500 monthly, $6K annually)

Select A Perk - See What You Get - Benefit

  • Thank You - $5

    What You Get: *Hand written thank you note - from us to you. Benefit: Our sincere appreciation for your support.

  • 1-Month Supply - $75 ($94)

    What You Get: *48-PACK of NRG MicroShots delivered to your door. *SPECIAL EDITION "NRG MicroShot Sponsor" cap and accessories (such as pens, notepads, widgets, etc). Benefit: *48-Pack of NRG MicroShots ($94 Value). *LIFETIME DISCOUNT (10% Off)

  • 3-Month Supply - $150 ($282)

    What You Get: *3-MONTH SUPPLY of NRG MicroShots (a 48-Pack delivered to your door every month for three months). *SPECIAL EDITION "NRG MicroShot Sponsor" cap and accessories (such as pens, notepads, widgets, etc). Benefit: *3-MONTH SUPPLY of NRG MicroShots ($282 Value). *LIFETIME DISCOUNT (15% Off)

  • 6-Month Supply - $275 ($564)

    What You Get: *6-MONTH SUPPLY of NRG MicroShots (a 48-Pack delivered to your door every month for six months). *SPECIAL EDITION "NRG MicroShot Sponsor" cap and accessories (such as pens, notepads, widgets, etc). Benefit: *6-MONTH SUPPLY of NRG MicroShots ($564 Value). *LIFETIME DISCOUNT (20% Off)

  • 1-Year Supply - $500 ($1,128)

    What You Get: *1-YEAR SUPPLY of NRG MicroShots (a 48-Pack delivered to your door every month for one year). *SPECIAL EDITION "NRG MicroShot Sponsor" cap and accessories (such as pens, notepads, widgets, etc). Benefit: *1-YEAR SUPPLY of NRG MicroShots ($1128 Value). *LIFETIME DISCOUNT (25% Off)

  • 2-Year Supply - $1,000 ($2,256)

    What You Get: *2-YEAR SUPPLY of NRG MicroShots (a 48-Pack delivered to your door every month for two years). *SPECIAL EDITION "NRG MicroShot Sponsor" cap and accessories (such as pens, notepads, widgets, etc). *OFFICIAL SPONSOR of NRG MicroShots with your name, company, and/or logo placed on our website in your honor. Benefit: *2-YEAR SUPPLY of NRG MicroShots ($2256 Value). *LIFETIME DISCOUNT (30% Off)

  • LifeTime Supply + Your Own NRG - $5,000

    What You Get: *LIFETIME SUPPLY of NRG MicroShots (a 48-Pack delivered to your door every month for twenty-five years). *SPECIAL EDITION "NRG MicroShot Sponsor" cap and accessories (such as pens, notepads, widgets). *OFFICIAL SPONSOR of NRG MicroShots with your name, company, and/or logo placed on our website in your honor. *LIMITED EDITION NRG MicroShots creatively named after you (such as Ben & Jerry's "Cherry Garcia" ice cream) with a unique flavor of your choice - Offered to the public on our website. Benefit: *LIFETIME SUPPLY of NRG MICROSHOTS ($20k+ Value). *LIMITED EDITION NRG MICROSHOTS CREATIVELY NAMED AFTER YOU (such as Ben & Jerry's "Cherry Garcia" ice cream) WITH A UNIQUE FLAVOR OF YOUR CHOICE- OFFERED TO THE PUBLIC ON OUR WEBSITE (Priceless). *LIFETIME DISCOUNT (50% Off)

Other Ways You Can Help - Our Referral Campaign

Refer as many friends as you can. Help us get the word out about this funding campaign. Take a look at the flyer below for more details. We really appreciate your support - On behalf of our family at NRG Blendz Inc., we'd like to thank you. Together we have the power to make this happen and we're happy to have you on our team!!!

Please Note:

We 100% guarantee to honor all contributions and their associated perks - Even if this funding campaign does not achieve its goal of $76k+. Thanks again!!!
story_txt:
NRG MicroShots Are HandCrafted 5ml Micro Energy Shots That Taste Great 
And Deliver 2-3 Hours Of Natural Uplifting Energy - No Jitters, No 
Crash. Made With Natural Ingredients In The USA.Our Story
Hi, my name is Patricia McCabe, and I’m the co-creator of
NRG MicroShots, along with my partner and husband Matt McCabe. This campaign is important to us because we need your
help. We have the kind of product that needs to go big in order to make it. We
need to be able to produce NRG MicroShots in larger quantities, and with some
product variations, to be successful. This can be done with the help of your support in funding our project.


Our business is family owned and operated - my husband and I have four
active children all between the ages of 6 and 19 years old – and we are
literally building it from the ground up. NRG MicroShots stem from an old family recipe, on my mom’s side, for apple cider. The recipe calls for
ingredients like cinnamon, orange, clove, apple, “secret” spices, apple cider
vinegar, and honey.We also incorporate energy supplement ingredients like natural
caffeine from real coffee beans, taurine, n-acetyl, l-tyrosine, and vitamins
B3, B6, and B12: 

Vitamin B Complex - Essential to maintain a healthy nervous system, raise good cholesterol, and increase metabolism.

Natural Caffeine - Keeps us alert and awake, reduces the risk of heart disease and diabetes, and is an effective antioxidant.

Taurine - Essential for cardiovascular function, development and function of skeletal muscle, and the central nervous system.

N-Acetyl L-Tyrosine - Improves brain function and increases mental alertness.


All the ingredients come together nicely, allowing us to create an 
energy drink that works great, tastes great, and makes your body feel
great – it’s a 5ml micro energy shot that delivers hours of energy. 
1 NRG MicroShot has as much caffeine as 1 cup of coffee and provides hours of energy - 130mg.

Fast acting with more control over when and how much energy is delivered.
No carbohydrates and only 7 calories per serving.
No jitters and no sugar crash.


Here is what's being said about NRG MicroShots:


Impact of NRG MicroShots
 I believe that we have created an awesome product that so many 
people can benefit from and enjoy - those who may be interested in energy shots, but don’t like the
 typically chalky or medicinal taste, the 2oz size, or the inconsistent 
effectiveness of other energy shots. 
NRG MicroShots taste great. They come in a small 5ml flip-top 
cylinder and provide hours of energy that feel natural to the 
body - no jitters, no shakes. We're on to 
something and need your help to take it to the next level.

We Need $76K In Funding To...
 

Move our business into a larger warehouse that's located in
Santa Cruz, California – a short distance from where we are now, (Cost, $35K annually, including utilities)

Purchase commercial product filling and packaging
machines. Although our product is handcrafted – our NRG
MicroShots are blended by hand, with skill and attention to detail – we need equipment to
help us expedite the filling and packaging of larger orders made by retailers and distributors. (Cost, $25K)
Increase our quantities of NRG MicroShot ingredients such as natural caffeine, taurine, vitamins B3, B6, B12, and so on, along with purchasing more production and packaging materials. (Cost, $10K to start)

Promote NRG MicroShots to the public. We want to reach out and talk to as many people as possible about this great product so we need to start an advertising budget. (Cost, $500 monthly, $6K annually)






Select A Perk - See What You Get - Benefit

Thank You - $5

What You Get: *Hand written thank you note - from us to you. Benefit: Our sincere appreciation for your support. 


1-Month Supply - $75 ($94)

What You Get: *48-PACK of NRG MicroShots  delivered to your door.
*SPECIAL EDITION "NRG MicroShot Sponsor" cap and accessories (such as pens, notepads, widgets, etc). Benefit: *48-Pack of NRG MicroShots ($94 Value). *LIFETIME DISCOUNT (10% Off)


3-Month Supply - $150 ($282)

What You Get: *3-MONTH SUPPLY of NRG MicroShots (a 48-Pack delivered to your door every month for three months).
*SPECIAL EDITION "NRG MicroShot Sponsor" cap and accessories (such as pens, notepads, widgets, etc). Benefit: *3-MONTH SUPPLY of NRG MicroShots ($282 Value). *LIFETIME DISCOUNT (15% Off)


6-Month Supply - $275 ($564)

What You Get: *6-MONTH SUPPLY of NRG MicroShots (a 48-Pack delivered to your door every month for six months).
*SPECIAL EDITION "NRG MicroShot Sponsor" cap and accessories (such as pens, notepads, widgets, etc). Benefit: *6-MONTH SUPPLY of NRG MicroShots ($564 Value). *LIFETIME DISCOUNT (20% Off)


1-Year Supply - $500 ($1,128)

What You Get: *1-YEAR SUPPLY of NRG MicroShots (a 48-Pack delivered to your door every month for one year).
*SPECIAL EDITION "NRG MicroShot Sponsor" cap and accessories (such as pens, notepads, widgets, etc). Benefit: *1-YEAR SUPPLY of NRG MicroShots ($1128 Value). *LIFETIME DISCOUNT (25% Off)




2-Year Supply - $1,000 ($2,256)
What You Get: *2-YEAR SUPPLY of NRG MicroShots (a 48-Pack delivered to your door every month for two years).
*SPECIAL EDITION "NRG MicroShot Sponsor" cap and accessories (such as pens, notepads, widgets, etc). *OFFICIAL SPONSOR of NRG MicroShots with your name, company, and/or logo placed on our website in your honor. Benefit: *2-YEAR SUPPLY of NRG MicroShots ($2256 Value). *LIFETIME DISCOUNT (30% Off)


LifeTime Supply + Your Own NRG - $5,000

What You Get: *LIFETIME SUPPLY of NRG MicroShots (a 48-Pack delivered to your door 
every month for twenty-five years).
*SPECIAL EDITION "NRG MicroShot Sponsor" cap and accessories (such as 
pens, notepads, widgets).
*OFFICIAL SPONSOR of NRG MicroShots with your name, company, and/or 
logo placed on our website in your honor.
*LIMITED EDITION NRG MicroShots creatively named after you (such as Ben
 & Jerry's "Cherry Garcia" ice cream) with a unique flavor of your 
choice - Offered to the public on our website. Benefit: *LIFETIME SUPPLY of NRG MICROSHOTS ($20k+ Value). *LIMITED EDITION NRG MICROSHOTS CREATIVELY NAMED AFTER YOU (such as Ben
 & Jerry's "Cherry Garcia" ice cream) WITH A UNIQUE FLAVOR OF YOUR CHOICE- OFFERED TO THE PUBLIC ON OUR WEBSITE (Priceless). *LIFETIME DISCOUNT (50% Off)



Other Ways You Can Help - Our Referral Campaign
 Refer as many friends as you can. Help us get the word out about this funding campaign. Take a look at the flyer below for more details. We really appreciate your support - On behalf of our family at NRG Blendz Inc., we'd like to thank you. Together we have the power to make this happen and we're happy to have you on our team!!!


Please Note:

We 100% guarantee to honor all contributions and their associated perks - Even if this funding campaign does not achieve its goal of $76k+. Thanks again!!!

story:
*04/05/15:  I did not make my fundraising goal, and knew it would be  a long shot to do in such a short amount of time.  I am so absolutely grateful for all of you who supported me.  I want to let you know I will be fighting to find a way to make all of this happen, regardless.  I have come so far for so long to just give up now.  Keep your eyes open, good things are about to happen.

*03/30/15:  These are my last 5 days of this fundraiser.  My whole life all I ever wanted to do was open a restaurant so I could share my Filipino culture through food.  I am so close to making this happen, I could really use your help to actually make it happen. 


Background Story and the Problem

I bought a former Indian restaurant and quickly discovered the space had way more substantial damage than I had previously thought and for what I was financially prepared.  The space had been operating as an Indian restaurant for the past 20 years when I bought it.  I naively thought taking over this existing restaurant would have less problems and would allow me to open quickly.

I was wrong.  Absolutely and completely wrong.

The damage I discovered was pretty much due to neglect, abuse and poor cleaning habits.  I even had to purge almost every single piece of equipment that came with the sale due to damage from misuse, neglect, and/or excessive grease.  I also lost 2 months trying to find replacement contractors after my original contractors bailed at the last minute.  When the new contractors finally came in, they discovered the kitchen walls and floors suffered from water damage, mold and wood rot from a bad plumbing system.   They also gradually discovered almost none of the plumbing and wiring was installed to code.

I have had this place since early January and was scheduled to open in late-February.  My timeline for opening has now been pushed back to early May.  To add to my challenges, I still have to pay rent because I was not able to successfully negotiate free rent from the landlord during the buildout phase.  My modest budget is quickly disappearing.  

                  

The Fix

I am asking for your help in raising $20,000 to help pay for the added construction repairs and to buy and/or replace all the damaged equipment I could not use from the sale.  My small business loan I got through the City is almost exhausted trying to keep up with all these unexpected  repairs.  All I wanted to do was just share my Filipino culture through food, but these repairs are too much for me to bear on my own.  This money will at least pay for these unbudgeted repairs, and also help me buy the remaining equipment needed for the kitchen.

If you want to help and be a part of getting the doors open to the newest Filipino restaurant in San Francisco, then please contribute now.  This campaign has a very short window, but I know we can make this happen.  Let's make this happen!

$16,000:  to cover extra repairs from hidden damages.

$4,000:  to buy remaining equipment needed to outfit the kitchen.

$20,000 = TOTAL NEEDED

Pampalasa and the Vision

Pampalasa means "to add flavor, to season or to spice."   Pampalasa will be a tropical, full-service restaurant serving rustic Filipino cuisine.  Its menu will reflect what many American-born Filipinos like me grew up with in our homes, but with just a touch of our own personal twist using healthier local ingredients and sustainable techniques - simple, yet fresh.  Thus, our menu will be a balance and mix of both traditional and modern dishes.

Filipino cuisine is recognizable by its tart flavors and vinegar base.  It is known for its combination of sour, sweet, salty and spicy...sometimes all in the same dish.  It reflects its centuries of colonization and foreign influences.  Pampalasa will initially only be open for lunch and weekend brunch, but will eventually expand to include regular dinner service.  I want our Filipino culture and cuisine to continue to be represented in San Francisco, and be represented well.

   

Neighborhood

Pampalasa is located on Folsom Street, between 8th and 9th Streets.  I am excited to be opening Pampalasa in SOMA, the historical home to the first generations of Filipino families in San Francisco since the early 1900's.   Many immigrant Filipino families and seniors still live and work there, a few nearby streets are named after Filipino heroes, Philippine murals still decorate some neighborhood walls and annual Filipino festivals are still celebrated.

Yet, through the result of ongoing gentrification in the SOMA neighborhood, the presence of the Filipino community is slowly dwindling.  It is my hope that by opening Pampalasa in our historical neighborhood, it will encourage other future entrepinoys to consider making SOMA their home so we do not completely lose our Filipino presence there.

"Tuloy Po Kayo" (welcome) - mural at the Bessie Carmichael School on Harrison @ 4th Street in SOMA.

Filipino Foodie Generation

I am proud of my Filipino heritage.  I am proud of my Filipino culture.  I am part of the new Filipino foodie generation.  And I want to share my Filipino culture with all of you through food.  Filipino food, as with all cultures, always reminds us of family and our community gatherings.  Food brings people together.  Our culture influences our food which creates our memories.  It is in those memories of growing up in my Filipino culture here in America that is driving me to open Pampalasa.

Who is this girl??

  

My name is Jennifer Villamin and I am an American-born Filipino.  Like many American-born Filipinos growing up, I always wondered why there were never any Filipino restaurants around.  Why has Filipino food never become mainstream like a lot of the other Asian cuisines out there, especially since we were such a big population.   I want to help change this and be a part of the next generation of "entrepinoys" looking to elevate our cultural cuisine to the next level.  Opening this restaurant will fulfill my college dream of helping to give back to the community in a way I have never been able to do before with just my ongoing volunteer work.  This restaurant will also give me the opportunity to open people up to Filipino food and culture so that they'll discover that we are so much more than just lumpia, adobo and Manny Pacquio. 

I worked about four years in the food industry in both back-of-the-house and front-of-the-house.   I was a cook for a couple years at the de Young Museum Cafe and with Taste Catering, along with being a cashier and food server for another couple years at random cafes.  I also volunteered a lot of my time as a culinary pavilion manager for local Filipino foodie events such as the Pistahan Parade and Festival and Savor Filipino.  Further, I went through the business program at the nonprofit Renaissance Entrepreneurship Center to put together a business plan.

Looking forward...

Once Pampalasa is up and running, one of my goals is to quickly start hosting a Guest Chef Night with a different Filipino chef every week.  The Bay Area is filled with Filipinos in the food industry, yet, the vast majority of them are not able to cook their own Filipino cuisine commercially.  They are almost all cooking someone else's cultural cuisine.  Pampalasa will give these folks the commercial outlet for them to express their Filipino culture through their own interpretations of Filipino cuisine.

But first, I have to get the doors open...

The T-Shirt!
(Contribution of $50 or more.  Choose standard or girly-cut.)
