story:
A hydroelectric power plant that won't damage the environment? Yes!

Now is your chance to support the future and be a part of affordable power revolution: contribute to the Tesla legacy now!

Support the research work the living descenant of Nikola Tesla for the next milestone of HEPP-1 river prototype!

Srpski, Magyar, Deutsch, Francais, Espanol please click here.

Tomislav Tesla's patented innovation uses the natural flow of water from rivers to produce a tremendous amount of clean, sustainable, and renewable electricity. This new Hydro Electric Power Plant (HEPP) is the long-awaited extension of the work achieved by Nikola Tesla, who harnessed the power of Niagara Falls when he launched the Tesla-Westinghouse Niagara Falls Power Plant in 1895.

The public thinks of Nikola Tesla as the foremost pioneer in the field of electricity for public consumption.  But his original dream was to revolutionize the turbines of hydroelectric power plants.

Check out Nikola Tesla's "real" story at theoatmeal.com!

Now Tomislav Tesla is ready to advance these ground-breaking inventions. Tomislav has followed in his family's footsteps by studying civil engineering and patenting his own designs - all to advance Nikola’s work by improving hydro power and offering this sustainable energy to the public.

Advancing the Tesla Family dream

Because Tomislav 100% committed for the Tesla family tradition and spent years working alongside the Danube river thinking about the future of power:

Do we really need to intrude on nature?

Are dams that obstruct the natural flow of the water truly necessary?

How do we maintain ecological balance and cooperate with this natural power to produce electricity?

What could the origin idea of my great ancestor, Nikola about the water power trough turbines?
 
Over the years, these questions inspired several plans and now the answer is clear:
The Tesla Hydroelectric Power Plant.

The Tesla HEPP-1 is a ground-breaking & patented river water turbine system!

With your contribution to collect the $30,000 USD is great help to finalize the lab prototype. The requires measurements and analysis can be made more accurate. So the preparing of river prototype can be well-founded!

Video: short film about the small laboratory prototype

Here's why our current water turbines need innovation!

Our modern lifestyles require an enormous amount of constant electricity. But we all know that to stop destroying the Earth, we need to find new sources of clean and sustainable energy. Rivers provide the answers. But the power plants and turbines of today only provide power by building huge and potentially destructive dams.

The environmental impact of dams includes direct negative affects on the biological, chemical & physical characteristics of rivers & streams.

These problems are addressed in many environmental studies, like the ones conducted by the World Wide Fund for Nature (WWF).

Tesla's turbines will be located on the riverbed, which means it will not interfere with shipping & the ecosystem will be mostly undisturbed. There is absolutely no need to build dams. No need to build flood gates & no need for canals to interfere with fish traffic.

What is Tesla's vision?

With your help we can provide Tomislav Tesla the freedom to create the TESLA HEPP system in order to provide affordable electricity to communities located near a river.  

We can also provide power to those places on Earth where there is no electrical grid but there is a nearby river to provide electrical power. 

 

The TESLA HEPP Innovation

The main innovation of the TESLA HEPP is that the blades of the turbine are turned by the flow of water like a conveyor belt, moving with the current and not in a spiral motion like the blades currently in use. With this solution, 100% of the current's power is collected on a much larger surface leading to greater efficiency.


Advantages of the TESLA HEPP:

  • Constant, sustainable and renewable system of energy production. 
  • Provides continuous and stable electric power without fluctuation, 24 hours a day,  365 days a year.  
  • 100% green, environmentally friendly energy, which does not interrupt the river flow & does not produce any harmful by-products or waste.  
  • Maintenance includes replacement of worn parts after 15-30 years of use (depending on workload & working capacity)  
  • Ensures continuous water supply without changing the river flow or affecting the natural water temperature ensuring it is not harmful to flora and fauna or the local settlements.
  • Has a positive effect on the carbon footprint and slows down climate change.
  • Creates new local jobs required for the production of the turbines and replacement parts in addition to the building needs, operation & servicing.
  • Enables river level control, which is an environmentally suitable solution for flood sensitive areas. Exceptionally low operational and maintenance costs.


Tomislav Tesla’s invention is unique in the market of hydroelectric power plant turbines and it is protected internationally by the World Intellectual Property Organization, located in Geneva, Switzerland.

Here is the direct link to: TESLA HYDROELECTRIC POWER PLANT WIPO 



Did you know?

Utilizing the natural flow of a river is not a new concept. Humanity has been using it for centuries to grind seeds in water mills or developing irrigation systems to water plants & farms. But using water to generate electricity is a much younger concept. The electromagnetic generator which was needed to do this was only patented in the 18th century by people like: Michael Faraday, Anyos Jedlik, Sir Charles Whetstone and Werner von Siemens.

Traditional hydroelectric plants use dams to elevate water levels and leverage gravity to spin turbines and generate electricity because this provides more energy than the natural current of the river. This often causes irreversible damage to nature!

The modern AC (alternative current) generator is a product of further research pioneered by Nikola Tesla who patented the first high voltage version in 1891. There are currently numerous research projects in progress throughout the world: gravitation water vortex power plant cross-flow turbine, Bánki-Michell turbine, or Ossberger turbine screw turbine Kaplan turbine Pelton wheel shrouded tidal turbine Gorlov helical turbine wave farms sea, ocean wave turbines tidal stream turbine

For more info, visit: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Category:Water_tur....

How will your donation help?

For the past several years, Tomislav Tesla's friends have helped him build a workshop prototype, which was used prove his theories in the Danube and to fill all the necessary patents to protect the innovation of his designs. To build a useable prototype, Tomislav needs to make improvements in several areas: manufacturing bigger moving parts, creating a large scale mechanical system and optimizing electricity conversion.

Be part of a power revolution: contribute to the Tesla legacy now!


The project will be completed according to these milestones:

$30,000 USD is great help to finalize the lab prototype. The requires measurements and analysis can be made more accurate. So the preparing of river prototype can be well-founded!

$70,000 USD is needed to model the river prototype, for the design and technical perfecting the 30 kW turbine plant.

$130,000 USD is needed to model the river prototype, for the design and technically perfecting the 30 kW turbine plant, with additional electronic and automatic equipment, generators.

$250,000 USD is needed to build a fully functional TESLA HEPP-1 river prototype!

$500,000 USD if this milestone is reached, we can prepare the team & construction of the first 250 kW Mini Power Plant.

$1,000,000 USD and we can happily implement the first TESLA HEPP-1 250 kW Mini Power Plant. This will supply of electricity at least 500 households.

Be a part of this groundbreaking innovation now!


Here is the rewards list, take a look and choose the best for you:

$10 USD, Digital prototype photograph
You're going to get a high-resolution digital photo of the Tesla HEPP construction with your name on and with Tomislav's signature! Perfect for a frame or your fridge.

(This picture is just a sample. The one we send will be a photo of the Tesla HEPP.)

$33 USD, TESLA HEPP bumper sticker
This is a special sticker of the TCN Campaign logo for your laptop or desk!


$40 USD, Printed photo of prototype
We will print an 8x10 photo of the TESLA HEPP construction with Tomislav Tesla's signature.


$60 USD, TESLA HEPP T-shirt
We have designed a very cool T-shirts with TCN Campaign logo & it'll look great on you! Let us know your type & size before shipping.

Type1:

Type2:

Type3:


$80 USD, Tesla's prototype sketch
You can have a printed replica of the sketch of Tomislav Tesla's prototype, drawn by Tesla himself & featuring your name & the inventor's signature.


$100 USD, Carve your name into history!
Your name & city will be carved into the groundbreaking construction of Tesla's Hydroelecric Power Plant 1!
Plus you’ll receive an HD digital photo of a custom designed plate featuring Tesla's favorite slogan:
 
"Our planet is unified for all people of goodwill."

$150 USD, Hero of the clean energy
You are a hero of clean energy! And for making the Tesla family dream come true, you will receive a sticker, T-shirt and printed sketch. Big hug!
    

      


$333 USD, TESLA HEPP metal medal
A special medal will be designed exclusively for the Tesla HEPP crowdfunding campaign by young up & coming sculptor, Aron Bohus.

(This sample from work of Aron is a medal depicting the first hungarian satellite)

$600 USD, 2D laser engraved plate
Unique 2D laser engraved plate with LED light of the innovative TESLA HEPP prototype.


$15,000 USD, 2 day VIP program with Tesla
You could be one of the three VIP visitors, at the special naming ceremony at the launch of the TESLA HEPP river prototype. With this reward you would also be a special guest at dinner with Tomislav Tesla. With this reward, you'll need to provide your own transportation to Serbia and pass a prior security screening prior to your donation being finalized. This reward is non transferable with special rules, so please contact us if you are interested.


History

In 2015 the international project team organized this crowdfunding campaign to raise money to build the patented working prototype. The campaign headquarters are in Budapest, Hungary, which allows the project to based in the European Union.

The next steps to building the river prototype, including the early stage R&D engineering processes, will be completed along the Danube River in Serbia, close to Tomislav Tesla.

To proceed, we need to build a large scale river prototype which will be funded by YOU with the help of crowdfunding.

We got lot of help to create this Indiegogo campaign, many thanks to Joseph Sikorski, director of Nikola Tesla films, to the Mulligan Brothers for video mix of the Leonardo diCaprio speech, to Reka Kovacs for the advises and to Marton Gombos for writing.


We need your help to develop the prototype!

Tomislav Tesla needs funding for:
  • Completion of a large scale, river prototype;
  • Permissions for final testing of the prototype from the local water management authorities & leasing the land;
  • Transport of large scale parts using a special transporter truck from the workshop in Novi Sad to the location;
  • All technical, engineering and computer processing in 3d Testing of the prototype, measuring the work function of the turbine, analysis and processing of the data results;
  • Video and photo materials for documentation and presentation;
  • Verification and signature from professional institute;
  • Completing the full documentation of the turbine's innovative technology.

Sneak peak into the work of Tesla!

Here's a look at the timeline of TESLA'S HEPP:


The international project team

Tomislav Tesla, Inventor, Serbia

Civil engineer, inventor, descendant of Nikola Tesla. Owner of the TESLA Hydroelectric Power Plant international patent.

Prof. Bozidar Mihic, Engineering Advisor, Serbia

Msc. Mechanical engineer, technical development expert.

Robert Uracs, Development Coordinator, Hungary/Serbia

Designer, international and implementation coordinator, graphic design of all visual elements for the crowdfunding campaign.

Laszlo Szaniszlo, Campaign Director, Hungary

Bsc. Electrical engineer, business development specialist, global crowdfunding manager.

Randi Paige, Communication & PR, Hungary/United States

Media professional, communications specialist & CEE resident bridging the U.S. & Europe.


More details at:

A magyar nyelvű összegzést itt találhatod meg: kérjük, kattints a linkre

Za rezime na srpskom jeziku molimo da kliknes na link ovde

For a summary in English, please click on this link

Für weitere Informationen, bitte klicken Sie auf den Link

Pour un résumé en Français, veuillez cliquer sur ce lien

Para leer un resumen en Español, por favor click aquí

FAQ

How can I help Tesla?

Choose a donation that works for you & be transfered to Indiegogo payments, where you can pay with either a credit card or your PayPal balance.
 

Is this payment secure?

Yes. Your data is only stored securely by the payment provider. We will not receive your credit card or other financial details.

When will you charge me?

When you make the donation. If the target amount is not met the first stretch goal, Tomislav Tesla will use the donations to keep live his work. If you using PayPal funds, please pay attention to your account balance, which needs to have enough money for selected rewards.

Where does my money go?

Trough Indiegogo to directly to Tomislav Tesla, the inventor.

What if I don't have a bankcard or PayPal account?

We recommend creating an account even just for this campaign; it is pretty simple, fast and straightforward. For the success of crowdfunding, your help is essential. If you are unable or unwilling to create an account but you would like to help, please contact us at teslahepp@gmail.com. with the amount of your donation.
 

Can I change my mind?

During the campaign you can cancel your perk, please contact us at teslahepp@gmail.com.
 

How do I tell you where to mail my reward?

After the successful funding of the campaign, we will contact you via email for your right mailing address. Because of this step, it is very important to provide a functioning email for your profile.
 

What is the conversion to USD or any other currency?

The payment providers will convert the donation using their actual conversion rates after the campaign has successfully ended. Your chosen donation amount will be charged to your account.

I want to help with something in addition to money. How can I do that?

Tomislav Tesla is very happy to receive any help that you can offer. After your donation, you can contact us via email at teslahepp@gmail.com.
story_txt:
A hydroelectric power plant that won't damage the environment?
Yes! 

Now is your chance to support the future and be a part of affordable power revolution: contribute to the Tesla legacy now!

Support the research work the living descenant of Nikola Tesla for the next milestone of HEPP-1 river prototype!

Srpski, Magyar, Deutsch, Francais, Espanol please click here.
Tomislav Tesla's patented innovation uses the natural flow of water from rivers to produce a 
tremendous amount of clean, sustainable, and renewable electricity. 
This new Hydro Electric Power Plant (HEPP) is the long-awaited extension of 
the work achieved by Nikola Tesla, who harnessed the power of Niagara 
Falls when he launched the Tesla-Westinghouse Niagara Falls Power Plant 
in 1895.The public thinks of Nikola Tesla as the foremost pioneer in the field of 
electricity for public consumption.  But his original dream was to revolutionize the turbines of 
hydroelectric power plants. 
Check out Nikola Tesla's "real" story at theoatmeal.com!Now Tomislav Tesla is ready to advance these ground-breaking inventions.  Tomislav has followed in his family's footsteps by studying civil engineering and patenting his own designs - all to advance Nikola’s work by improving hydro power and offering this sustainable energy to the public.Advancing the Tesla Family dreamBecause Tomislav 100%
 committed for the Tesla family tradition and spent years working 
alongside the Danube river thinking about the future of power:
Do we really need to intrude on nature?   
Are dams that obstruct the natural flow of the water truly necessary?
How do we maintain ecological balance and cooperate with this natural power to produce electricity?What could the origin idea of my great ancestor, Nikola about the water power trough turbines? Over the years, these questions inspired several plans and now the answer is clear:The Tesla Hydroelectric Power Plant.  The Tesla HEPP-1 is a ground-breaking & patented river water turbine system! With your contribution to collect the $30,000 USD is great help to finalize the lab prototype. The 
requires measurements and analysis can be made more accurate. So the 
preparing of river prototype can be well-founded!Video: short film about the small laboratory prototype
Here's why our current water turbines need innovation!

Our modern lifestyles require an enormous amount of constant 
electricity.  But we all know that to stop destroying the Earth, we need
 to find new sources of clean and sustainable energy.   

Rivers provide the answers.

But the power plants and turbines of today only provide power by 
building huge and potentially destructive dams.  The 
environmental impact of dams includes direct negative affects on the 
biological, chemical & physical characteristics of rivers & 
streams.  

These problems are addressed in many environmental studies, like the ones conducted by the World Wide Fund for Nature (WWF).
Tesla's turbines will be located on the riverbed, which means it will 
not interfere with shipping & the ecosystem will be mostly 
undisturbed.  There is absolutely no need to build dams.  No need to 
build flood gates & no need for canals to interfere with fish 
traffic.  
What is Tesla's vision?

With your help we can provide Tomislav Tesla the freedom to create 
the TESLA HEPP system in order to provide affordable electricity to 
communities located near a river.  We can also provide power to those places on Earth where there is no 
electrical grid but there is a nearby river to provide electrical power.  The TESLA HEPP Innovation

The main innovation of the TESLA HEPP is that the blades of the 
turbine are turned by the flow of water like a conveyor belt, moving 
with the current and not in a spiral motion like the blades currently in
 use.  With this solution, 100% of the current's power is collected on a
 much larger surface leading to greater efficiency.
Advantages of the TESLA HEPP:

    
Constant, sustainable and renewable system of energy production. 

    Provides continuous and stable electric power without fluctuation, 24 hours a day,  365 days a year.  
    
100% green, environmentally friendly energy, which does not 
interrupt the river flow & does not produce any harmful by-products 
or waste.  
    
Maintenance includes replacement of worn parts after 15-30 years of use (depending on workload & working capacity)
     
Ensures continuous water supply without changing the river flow or 
affecting the natural water temperature ensuring it is not harmful to 
flora and fauna or the local settlements.
    
Has a positive effect on the carbon footprint and slows down climate change.
    
Creates new local jobs required for the production of the turbines 
and replacement parts in addition to the building needs, operation &
 servicing.  
    
Enables river level control, which is an environmentally suitable solution for flood sensitive areas.
    Exceptionally low operational and maintenance costs. 

Tomislav Tesla’s invention is unique in the market of hydroelectric 
power plant turbines and it is protected internationally by the World 
Intellectual Property Organization, located in Geneva, Switzerland.Here is the direct link to: TESLA HYDROELECTRIC POWER PLANT WIPO 
Did you know?

Utilizing the natural flow of a river is not a new concept. Humanity has been using it for centuries to grind seeds in water mills or developing irrigation systems to water plants & farms.  

But using water to generate electricity is a much younger concept. The electromagnetic generator which was needed to do this was only patented in the 18th century by people like: Michael Faraday, Anyos Jedlik, Sir Charles Whetstone and Werner von Siemens. 

Traditional hydroelectric plants use dams to elevate water levels and leverage gravity to spin turbines and generate electricity because this provides more energy than the natural current of the river. This often causes irreversible damage to nature! 

The modern AC (alternative current) generator is a product of further research pioneered by Nikola Tesla who patented the first high voltage version in 1891. 

There are currently numerous research projects in progress throughout the world:

    gravitation water vortex power plant
    cross-flow turbine, Bánki-Michell turbine, or Ossberger turbine
    screw turbine
    Kaplan turbine
    Pelton wheel
    shrouded tidal turbine
    Gorlov helical turbine
    wave farms
    sea, ocean wave turbines
    tidal stream turbine
For more info, visit: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Category:Water_tur....

$500,000 USD if this milestone is reached, we can prepare the team & construction of the first 250 kW Mini Power Plant.

$1,000,000 USD and we can happily implement the first TESLA HEPP-1 250 kW Mini Power Plant. This will supply of electricity at least 500 households.

story:
Short Summary

Hi,

For those who don't know about me and who have never heard of me before, well, I will say something in a simple words about me and what I do and what I stand for.     

My name is Bogdan Majkic and I'm from Melbourne, Australia.                                           I am very passionate Inventor who have developed or better to say designed a number of different Technologies, which some of them are ready to be Taken to commercialization and become available to general public to benefit from.  

I have Patented systems and some which are Patent pending and many other designs and Ideas which I like to develop and introduce to variety of different Industries and general population all around the World. I cover so many if not all different Technological backgrounds and have that ability to design, understand  and  construct. What ever it is that comes across I believe that I can improve in some way and improve it almost to maximum of its potential. 

Also to my understanding of things and life in general every question has an answer to it and suitable solution as well. All we have to do is to spot those and act on them in the best way we can and apply those solutions, so we can make things easier for us all in all aspects of our lives and living.

Technology that I am working on is so unique and at the same time so advanced and important as well, that World have no seen yet such a Concepts and possibly would newer be able to come up with them if it was not for my devoted interest in those and talent to put them all together, and also to offer them to World's strongest Industries for benefit of all. 

Generally I newer ask anyone for help in life and I don't really feel comfortable doing this Campaign, but at this moment and due to lack of support from everyone or better to say those who could make a difference, I kind of have no choice but to tray this Campaign, to see if I can collect some funds to be able to develop these Technologies that are of great importance to us all, now and on the long run and that far future. That is from my aspect and it would be from all those who would understand that same.

Yes I have variety of Technologies to prove and I have some images attached on this links Gallery so you are most welcome to visit and see for your self what is all about. If not please contact me direct and I will share some information's with you. There is a Hydro Generator (Solar Concentrated System and many more),  or best of all Hydro solution that will improve any Hydro Dam and efficiency of them all for example. The system is so advanced that even Hydro and Energy Industry are not sure how it will affect everything and what changes could happen if this Concept goes ahead and gets excepted. These are main reasons for lack of support in a way as Technology possibly needs to be explained and in fact developed, so we can all withes for us self's, what is all about. In order to do this I need huge funds which I don't have, so I can develop and advance the way we consume electricity for example. 

I  have so many advanced Energy solution and other Technologies that I have worked out  which require very large funding's that I don't have. 

I hope you good people understand my intentions and my reason for running of this Campaign. I have donated and publish some of my work to entire Humanity already, and many people are aware of what I do all around the world and I am sure that they are not shocked with this Campaign at all and that they understand my position and my greatest intentions as well for benefit of all.

The amount that I have placed on this campaign is just a minor cost of what I have to develop, but it would be wonderful start where I would be able to develop working models and perhaps manufacture those as well in the near future. It is not an easy process but for those that are devoted and passionate about they work it would not be hard either.

I was originally after Investor and people of interest in my Technologies so we can take this Technologies of the ground. In order to do that I have to develop a number of different models and prove and offer the same to  the market and variety of Industries. I have worked on Renewable Energy solutions and have so many to offer, which are as we all know so important for our Environment and our future developments and the way we will continue to power out homes. I also have those so called  Advanced Energy Solutions to offer and a number of different designs and variety of different Technologies.

I hope that you understand all that and that with your help we can make all this possible and if not I will continue on my own and my journey of advancing the world in the field of greatest importance.

Thank you for reading of this and for your understanding and you contribution in all this and if any.

Regards, 

                    What We Need & What You Get

   What i need to do is to develop working models R&D on them and to start perhaps manufacturing of those same Technologies so we have a ball rolling in real direction. 

I have Hydro Generator and variety of Hydro Concepts  to develop ( costs would be around AU $ 60 000 just for working models, each), about 8-10 different Magnet motors ( around AU $50 000 for all), New Foundation which is Earthquake prove Foundation ( around AU $150 000), New Airplane/Helicopter/Space Ship (costs around AU$ 300 000), New Concentrated PV Solar Dish ( costs around AU $ 100 000) and so many other systems and Technologies to develop and to demonstrate where I would need millions in the future just like any other Org. or a Research Company and that is just for a Research (R&D) its self and demonstrations.

Once I have that starting point I would be able I believe to distribute and profit from some of those Systems and fund others as well and have it full on rolling, where we all would gain from all this in so many different ways. 

Once and if everything goes according to plans I would give back and in return regularly and randomly developed and working models to those in need all around the world,  to Universities for additional study and learning, to all of you who have seriously contribute to this Campaign and have helped me to make my dream possible and for benefit of all on a long run.

I would keep my work published and keep everyone informed of my progress and would continue to contribute again and again for advancing of out World and our Planet in a best and the most possible advanced way.  

I have those skills and I do believe in what I do as many already well know on Facebook, LinkedIn, Tweeter and some other Internet sites.

If this Campaign is not successful and some funds do get collected, all amount would be strictly invested in Technology alone and for the purpose that is designed for. It is not a easy task so I hope that you all understand my position and my true intentions here in all.

I would love to develop all those and demonstrate to all something so advanced where our children can advance and many many Generations to come benefit from my hard work and you help by Contributing to this cause.

That is kind of stuff that I do and love doing and that you would also as a general population and societies  get back in return from me. Investing in my projects is instant investing in your own future as well and at the same time and many Generations to come.

Thank you!


                                The Impact

I have explained already few things but I would say that importance of my Projects is so huge that if and when I demonstrate all those models and Technology gets developed, the entire World would be on the huge improve and so Technologically advanced that many just would not believe that was ever possible. 

I only know for sure the real importance o all my Projects. 

There were not all designed for me to profit from them but for all of Humanity to benefit from it. I have proven my point many times a specially on Facebook by sharing  of so many information and designs and helping many times many people to work out those great solutions. 

That is what kind of guy I am and what I stand for.


                          Risks & Challenges

There are risks involved like in everything we do, but I say if its meant to be than there are no risks involved. Anything that we come across in mean time will have solution to it and I am sure of that. I like to establish a Team work as well where we can establish a  real Technological center and continue with future Research and Development (R&D) that will expend into real and Educative Program and for benefit of all new generations and students as well.

This is real and I am confident that I can develop all those and that I will, with or with our your help.  

                     Other Ways You Can Help

If you can not help and contribute to this Campaign please share this Indiegogo Campaign and let others know about it and please use  Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you!

Also to my understanding of things and life in general every question has an answer to it and suitable solution as well. All we have to do is to spot those and act on them in the best way we can and apply those solutions, so we can make things easier for us all in all aspects of our lives and living.
Technology that I am working on is so unique and at the same time so advanced and important as well, that World have no seen yet such a Concepts and possibly would newer be able to come up with them if it was not for my devoted interest in those and talent to put them all together, and also to offer them to World's strongest Industries for benefit of all. 
Generally I newer ask anyone for help in life and I don't really feel comfortable doing this Campaign, but at this moment and due to lack of support from everyone or better to say those who could make a difference, I kind of have no choice but to tray this Campaign, to see if I can collect some funds to be able to develop these Technologies that are of great importance to us all, now and on the long run and that far future. That is from my aspect and it would be from all those who would understand that same.
Yes I have variety of Technologies to prove and I have some images attached on this links Gallery so you are most welcome to visit and see for your self what is all about. If not please contact me direct and I will share some information's with you. There is a Hydro Generator (Solar Concentrated System and many more),  or best of all Hydro solution that will improve any Hydro Dam and efficiency of them all for example. The system is so advanced that even Hydro and Energy Industry are not sure how it will affect everything and what changes could happen if this Concept goes ahead and gets excepted. These are main reasons for lack of support in a way as Technology possibly needs to be explained and in fact developed, so we can all withes for us self's, what is all about. In order to do this I need huge funds which I don't have, so I can develop and advance the way we consume electricity for example. 
I  have so many advanced Energy solution and other Technologies that I have worked out  which require very large funding's that I don't have. 
I hope you good people understand my intentions and my reason for running of this Campaign. I have donated and publish some of my work to entire Humanity already, and many people are aware of what I do all around the world and I am sure that they are not shocked with this Campaign at all and that they understand my position and my greatest intentions as well for benefit of all.
The amount that I have placed on this campaign is just a minor cost of what I have to develop, but it would be wonderful start where I would be able to develop working models and perhaps manufacture those as well in the near future. It is not an easy process but for those that are devoted and passionate about they work it would not be hard either.
I was originally after Investor and people of interest in my Technologies so we can take this Technologies of the ground. In order to do that I have to develop a number of different models and prove and offer the same to  the market and variety of Industries. I have worked on Renewable Energy solutions and have so many to offer, which are as we all know so important for our Environment and our future developments and the way we will continue to power out homes. I also have those so called  Advanced Energy Solutions to offer and a number of different designs and variety of different Technologies.
I hope that you understand all that and that with your help we can make all this possible and if not I will continue on my own and my journey of advancing the world in the field of greatest importance.
Thank you for reading of this and for your understanding and you contribution in all this and if any.
Regards, 
                    What We Need & What You Get
   What i need to do is to develop working models R&D on them and to start perhaps manufacturing of those same Technologies so we have a ball rolling in real direction. 
I have Hydro Generator and variety of Hydro Concepts  to develop ( costs would be around AU $ 60 000 just for working models, each), about 8-10 different Magnet motors ( around AU $50 000 for all), New Foundation which is Earthquake prove Foundation ( around AU $150 000), New Airplane/Helicopter/Space Ship (costs around AU$ 300 000), New Concentrated PV Solar Dish ( costs around AU $ 100 000) and so many other systems and Technologies to develop and to demonstrate where I would need millions in the future just like any other Org. or a Research Company and that is just for a Research (R&D) its self and demonstrations.
Once I have that starting point I would be able I believe to distribute and profit from some of those Systems and fund others as well and have it full on rolling, where we all would gain from all this in so many different ways. 
Once and if everything goes according to plans I would give back and in return regularly and randomly developed and working models to those in need all around the world,  to Universities for additional study and learning, to all of you who have seriously contribute to this Campaign and have helped me to make my dream possible and for benefit of all on a long run.
I would keep my work published and keep everyone informed of my progress and would continue to contribute again and again for advancing of out World and our Planet in a best and the most possible advanced way.

That is kind of stuff that I do and love doing and that you would also as a general population and societies  get back in return from me. Investing in my projects is instant investing in your own future as well and at the same time and many Generations to come.
Thank you!

I only know for sure the real importance o all my Projects.

story:
HELP US DEVELOP HAIROLOGIE NOW!

Why We Need $75,000.00

Apps are expensive.  A very nice looking  and well developed app is very expensive. We simply need $75,000 in order to enter into the next phase of our development in order to launch the app with the outlined features (you'll read about below) for FREE to the community.  

Here is a breakdown of the expenses:

Simple Android and  iOS 

$16,000.00

Social Media Login

$8,000.00

Personal Profile

$6,000.00

Ability for In-App Purchases

$6,000.00

Ability to Rate Products & Services

$6,000.00

Beautifully Designed

$33,000

TOTAL

$75,000.00

Make a $20 donation in honor of a Beautiful, Black and Brilliant girl or woman you know and together let's bring Hairologie to the market.

Hairologie presents the TRIPLE B (Beautiful, Black and Brilliant) Campaign.  In order to bring Hairologie to the market we're asking you to take part in the TRIPLE B Challenge by donating at least $20 in honor of a Beautiful, Black and Brilliant woman or girl you know!

In addition to providing the resources women of color need to enhance their outer beauty, at the heart of Hairologie is the inner desire to empower females of all ages to love themselves from within.  



Our Story


The Hairologie Journey

 Hairologie, the only beauty centric social network serving women of color, was founded out of the desire to locate reputable and professional stylists who were dedicated to serving the beauty needs of women of color.  Today, Hairologie, serves as a FREE first in class social media tool designed to give women of color access to all things hair.  Hairologie’s one of a kind search tool enables users to pull multiple types of media including videos, blog's and diary posts on just about anything related to hair. 

Saana Holley, CEO and President of Hairologie, embarked upon a journey 11 years ago to develop an aesthetically pleasing and empowering application that would irrevocably change the landscape of the African American hair and beauty industry.

During her journey to impact the world of black beauty, Saana teamed up with Emeka Raijs, a talented User Experience Expert, who began to bring life to Saana's vision and created a rich and aesthetically pleasing application.  After facing a few setbacks and having to overcome financial loses, Saana and Emeka teamed up with Kellie P. Easton to rethink the best method to bring Hairologie to the market.

The team of three worked diligently, always considering the end user in mind, to create what is going to be a game changer towards the way women of color learn, discover and share all things beauty and hair.


These answers lead to the creation of Hairologie.


Beauty Innovation at Your Fingertips


Hairologie users are given journals where they can record their hair journeys, keep notes regarding products and services, locate stylist, make recommendations and socialize with other Hairologie users.

Hairologie is the only platform specifically designed for users to vividly document their beauty journeys using multiple types of media.


Hairologie Supports Multiple Types of Media


From rich videos and captivating images to insightful product and service feedback, Hairologe provides users with a curated experience designed specifically to empower every user to make and feel good about their beauty.

Never before could women of color go to one location and learn, discover and share anything regarding their hair care needs and desires. 


Other Hairologie Features

Moreover, Hairologie will serve as a place for positive social networking designed to celebrate the users and form supportive online communities that will ultimately pour out into the community at large.


Other Ways You Can Help

By joining our mission to irrevocably change the landscape of the African American hair and the beauty industry, you are embarking on a journey that will impact the lives of women of color and the small professional businesses striving to serve them. 

There are multiple ways you can spread some Hairologie Love: 

1. Send an email to your contacts using any of the images below and linking it to our website (www.hairologie.com) 


2. Print and share our media kit in your hair salon, favorite coffee shop, boutique, campus, library, throughout your community and at events. 

3. Using the link to the top right of this page, email, embed and share this page with everyone you know.

3. Make posts throughout the week on your favorite social media platforms. 

Here are a few suggested messages:

Twitter Messages

-  Kicking it up a Notch for the Brown Girls @GoGoHairologie is Now on Indiegogo

-  Proudly supporting @Hairologie with #GoGoHairologie because #TripleBSumsItUp Fund Hairologie www.hairologie.com

-  The world needs @Hairologie! Learn how you can support #GoGoHairologie www.hairologie.com #TripleBSumsItUp

Facebook Messages:

-  Kicking it up a Notch for the Brown Girls @Hairologie is Now on Indiegogo visit their site to learn more: www.hairologie.com

-  Proudly supporting @Hairologie with #GoGoHairologie because #TripleBSumsItUp Help Fund Hairologie learn more: www.hairologie.com

-  Support beauty, support black businesses, support the black economy #GoGoHairologie Visit Hairologie: www.hairologie.com

We truly appreciate the investment of time you’re dedicating to supporting this campaign. 

We are extremely passionate about launching this app as a FREE tool for women. 

So much time, money and resources have been invested and with your help we know we can reach our goal and make a positive impact.

Here’s to you for your support! Now Share AWAY! 

With our deepest gratitude, 

The Hairologie Team:

Saana H.

Emeka R.

Kellie E.

-  Kicking it up a Notch for the Brown Girls @Hairologie is Now on Indiegogo visit their site to learn more: www.hairologie.com

We truly appreciate the investment of time you’re dedicating to supporting this campaign. 
We are extremely passionate about launching this app as a FREE tool for women. 
So much time, money and resources have been invested and with your help we know we can reach our goal and make a positive impact.

Emeka R.
Kellie E.

story:
What is Furnish Out?

Furnish Out is a for-profit business that raises money for orphaned children in China. This happens in three simple steps:

1) We support local Chinese artisans by purchasing from them quality, handmade furniture and home furnishings.

2) We bring those quality, handmade pieces of furniture and furnishings back to the United States and sell them for profit.

3) We donate all of the proceeds from the sales of those pieces to China Hope Foundation* which is a non-profit organization caring for orphaned children in China.

*There are no administrative fees paid to anyone involved in the operating of either Furnish Out or China Hope Foundation.

The mission of Furnish Out is to aid orphans in Chinese foster homes through the disbursement of money from the sale of quality, handmade furniture and home furnishings from China. 

Our vision is to help provide orphaned children with what is useful and necessary to meet their financial, nutritional, spiritual, medical, and social needs; to see artisans paid a fair price for their work; and to give people the opportunity to own a quality, handmade, and unique piece of furniture or home accessory.


Question:

Why is Furnish Out an LLC and not a non-profit organization (501c3)?

The short answer is because we don’t qualify.  The majority of our income comes from non-business related activities and, therefore, for tax purposes we must be established as a for-profit business. Despite being a for-profit business though, no administrative fees are paid to anyone involved with Furnish Out, and 100% of the profit made by the sale of every piece goes to charity. 


The Furniture

Each piece of furniture and each decorative accessory is made or refinished by hand using new or reclaimed wood. Each piece is unique and has a story behind it. Information, when applicable, about where it originated, what type of wood it is made from, how long it took to construct or refinish, approximately how old it might be, and what its original purpose might have been will be provided with each and every item sold. To provide people with a conversation piece for their home or office, and to know that the money spent on it went to a great cause are part of what make this an exclusive business opportunity.


The Artisans 

This is George Hong. He is the Owner and Manager of George Hong Classical Furniture and has been in the furniture-making business since 1999. He currently employs 9 artisans from the Shandong and Anhui Provinces.  Only 6 of them had any experience with designing, restoring, or building handmade furniture prior to coming to work for him. About 60% of the pieces they sell are made there at his shop in Beijing, and the rest are pieces, including antiques, that he buys to refinish from different builders struggling to stay afloat, or he resurrects from torn down villages all over China.

This is John Wang. He is the Manager and Designer for Lasting Style Antique Furniture Factory. John began scouting and buying antique furniture in Shandong, China in 1996.  He started off with business partners but has been on his own since 1998 and, since that time, has grown the business exponentially employing more than 20 artisans to date. The majority of these individuals come from Hebei and Gansu with little to no experience or training. Though novices, they are willing and eager to learn the skills of design, restoration, and building that John and his proficient carpenter teach.  Around 80% of the pieces they sell are handmade or modified there at his shop in Gaobeidian.

China Hope Foundation

China Hope Foundation is a non-profit organization (501c3) that was founded in 2009 by two people we feel lucky to call our friends. In 2011 they built and opened a foster home called Alenah's House through which they will soon begin a fostering program. In 2014, they opened the China Hope Center in Beijing which is a humanitarian aid center focusing on social work, orphan relief, counseling and training.  These are just a few of the worthwhile projects that China Hope has executed on behalf of orphaned children. The organization is run by trustworthy people and they have feet on the ground in China so we can be assured of exactly where the money is going. They take no fees for their administrative work, they get no governmental subsidies, and 100% of every donation goes directly to a person, project, or family.  It is for these reasons that Furnish Out has partnered with China Hope Foundation, and it is our goal to raise money to fund as many of their future projects as possible.


Funding
I believe in the mission of this business so much that I have put a significant amount of my own money into covering the start-up costs. I have reached a point though, that in order to continue, I need to ask for help from family, friends, and anyone else willing to help out. The $60,000 goal I have set will cover the cost of inventory for a small container (20-foot) of goods plus operating expenses for the first year. Operating expenses include, but are not limited to, the costs of shipping, storage, marketing, and accountant fees.   
If I am able to raise more than $60,000, I will purchase a large container (40-foot) of goods which will allow me to provide greater financial stability to the artisans through the purchase of their work, provide a greater number of people with a handmade, high quality, and unique piece for their home, and, most importantly, contribute a greater amount of money to aid the deserving children.


Risks and Challenges

The biggest challenge is not raising enough money for this idea of a business to become a reality.  The hope by asking for your help is that we can overcome this challenge and make this business happen for the artisans who will get fair pay for their work, the customers who will get a handmade, high quality and unique conversation piece, and the children who will get a chance at a better future.


Perks

Furnish Out is a business serving as a fundraiser, and for that reason we are conservative with our spending. Having said that, we are extremely grateful for any and all contributions so are using our best resources as rewards for those who help us get this business off the ground. Any $10,000 donation gets one piece of handmade furniture of your choice from our first collection. If you are local, we will arrange delivery to your home. If you are not local (you must live in the US) we will cover the cost of shipping it to you. This is an extremely unique offer because you will get first pick from the first shipment, and be one of the first to own a piece of furniture from Furnish Out.
Any $5,000 donation gets one decorative, handmade accessory of your choice from the first collection.  If you are local, we will arrange delivery to your home. If you are not local (you must live in the US) we will cover the cost of shipping it to you. This is also a unique offer because you will get first pick from the first shipment, and be one of the first to own a decorative accessory from Furnish Out.
We have created a Thank You page on our website, and a donation of $300 dollars or more will put your name on it!
We are extremely appreciative for any contribution that is made to Furnish Out, and we want to extend a huge thank you for your donation no matter the amount!


Other Ways You Can Help 

Even if you can't contribute financially, it would be much appreciated if you would  spread the word about this campaign to people you know. Indiegogo has some great sharing tools that make that easy to do. We have a website (www.furnishout.com) where people can learn more about who we are, see more pictures, and contact us with questions. You can also like us on Facebook! Please check back on the Furnish Out website in a few months because, if this business takes off and the site is full of pictures of beautiful pieces for sale, we would love to have you as a customer!

This is an extremely unique offer because you will get first pick from the first shipment, and be one of the first to own a piece of furniture from Furnish Out.Any $5,000 donation gets one decorative, handmade accessory of your choice from the first collection.  If you are local, we will arrange delivery to your home. If you are not local (you must live in the US) we will cover the cost of shipping it to you. This is also a unique offer because you will get first pick from the first shipment, and be one of the first to own a decorative accessory from Furnish Out.We have created a Thank You page on our website, and a donation of $300 dollars or more will put your name on it!We are extremely appreciative for any contribution that is made to Furnish Out, and we want to extend a huge thank you for your donation no matter the amount!



Other Ways You Can Help 
Even if you can't contribute financially, it would be much appreciated if you would  spread the word about this campaign to people you know. Indiegogo has some great sharing tools that make that easy to do. We have a website (www.furnishout.com) where people can learn more about who we are, see more pictures, and contact us with questions. You can also like us on Facebook! Please check back on the Furnish Out website in a few months because, if this business takes off and the site is full of pictures of beautiful pieces for sale, we would love to have you as a customer!

story:
About This Project

C.O.O.K.I.E. (Create Opportunities. Overflowing Knowledge. Innately Empowered.) is a multi-faceted platform that connects current and aspiring women business owners digitally, and in-person.  C.O.O.K.I.E. curates educational content that inspires women.  C.O.O.K.I.E. creates casual, chic and inexpensive event experiences that connect women.  C.O.O.K.I.E. chooses to highlight business owners that will cajole women to get to work on their entrepreneurial endeavors.

Before C.O.O.K.I.E., there was no place where current and aspiring female entrepreneurs could meet and connect constantly and comfortably, in a non-intimidating and inexpensive way.  I created this platform to change that.  I believe that we ALL possess something within us that can be cultivated and offered to the masses for profit, and I need YOUR help to make sure C.O.O.K.I.E. has what it needs to GROW. 

How will the money be used?

The $8,000 that YOU give will help C.O.O.K.I.E. THRIVE:

  • Better #COOKIEChick Feature Interviews, Photos and Video.

  • A dedicated co-working and event space for female entrepreneurs and their ventures.

  • More amazing yearly conference experiences, starting with the 2015 C.O.O.K.I.E. Conference.

  • A Team of Content Creators and Collaborators.

  • More National Events (LA, Chicago, New Orleans, Miami... etc...etc) ***like this one...***  

  • New and Improved Website & Maintenance.

  • Business trademarking, licenses, etc.


What do you get?

Some amazing female entrepreneurs have created a few of the perks you’ll receive for supporting the effort:

  • Complimentary VIP entry into our chic and intimate (and celebrity) networking events.

  • Tweets and Instagram posts to highlight you and your business.

  • Inspiring video messages that will keep you motivated when you feel like giving up. 

  • Year-long memberships to C.O.O.K.I.E.

  • One-on-one communication strategy sessions to help you better brand and promote your business efforts.

  • All expense paid trips to Washington, DC.

  • You could be a special guest at the 2015 C.O.O.K.I.E Conference.

****Additional perks will be announced throughout the campaign.****

If the entire goal isn’t reached, 60% of the funding will go towards securing part-time writers and graphic designers, so that C.O.O.K.I.E. is updated and constantly inspiring individuals via articles, #COOKIEchick features and social media posts. Some of the funds will also be used for the June 2015 #COOKIECocktails event in Los Angeles, and initial cost of the 2nd annual C.O.O.K.I.E. Conference for female entrepreneurs.  


The Impact

C.O.O.K.I.E. is necessary! Your contribution means more than providing the finances to make sure entrepreneurs are connected and motivated.  Your contribution is a public testament to your belief in creating your own opportunity.  Your contribution says loud and clear that you believe in the power of entrepreneurship, worldwide.  Your contribution shows that you believe in US!


Risks & Challenges

Getting this campaign into the hands of thousands (hopefully millions) of people is the biggest challenge, thus far.   A team of amazing professionals has been assembled to help bring the campaign to fruition.  Their expertise and skill, matched with your support, will overshadow any obstacles that may stand in our way. 

The advertised perks are well within our capability, and we’ll be able to honor whatever funding level we receive.

C.O.O.K.I.E. will continue to work, regardless of how much is raised.  That’s how committed we are to the mission.  


Other Ways You Can Help

Every bit helps.  Even if you can’t contribute monetarily, coming to this page and watching the video shows that you support creating your own opportunities.  Please continue to spread this message to the masses by doing the following:

  • Sending this message out via Facebook: I just committed $[insert amount] to helping women biz owners THRIVE w/ @theCOOKIElife. You should too! bit.ly/COOKIE2Thrive

  • Telling a current or aspiring business owner that you respect them for creating their own opportunity.

  • Emailing the link to this page to someone you know (or send it to them via Instant Message or text).

  • Following C.O.O.K.I.E on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter.

  • Watching a video of a past C.O.O.K.I.E. event.

  • Using the Indiegogo share tools to get C.O.O.K.I.E. worldwide!



The #COOKIE2Thrive Team

  • Patrice Cameau

  • Chasity Cooper

  • Trivell Miller 

  • Casey Snipes

Using the Indiegogo share tools to get C.O.O.K.I.E. worldwide!The #COOKIE2Thrive Team


Patrice Cameau

Casey Snipes

story:
We believe in Empowering people from all walks of life. The #empoweritforward project is the peoples solution to end human suffering of any kind as it enables people and communities to access their inherent power to handle any situation with the full potential of the resources available. Empowerment fuels our individual and collective creative Spirit. 

The active & conscious process of mutual empowerment, through kindness, a smile or a hug reconnects people to their dormant love for themselves & each other. This project by Mpowered Life® is aimed at connecting people and communities around the world and impacting lives through the most influential act of love, Empowerment. We believe that when we exchange these values, it creates the foundation for communities and individuals to become self-sustainable.

New Partnership Announcement & End of Campaign Perk Offer!


$5 from every purchase will be donated directly to the Bali Children's Project. It may not seem like much, but $5 is enough to put a child in school for one month in Bali. 


By purchasing this last minute perk, a hand carved Balinese Buddha, you will be assisting in providing sustainable opportunities for more children in Bali to receive an education. 

Please share this update with your friends, family & on FB & help us shine a guiding light of Hope to children in need.

For more info on BCP check out our most recent update posted today.




                    How the Empower it Forward Project works with your support. 


"We rise by lifting others." - Robert Ingersoll



By helping us reach our goal of $9,999 you will take part in the launch of a project that will touch the lives of many, while creating awareness, and Empowering men & women through entrepreneurial development, aiming for self-sustainability. 

Phase I - Launch this Indiegogo campaign to fund our start up. This involves an e-commerce site (Mpowered Life) where artisans around the world can sell their work to to the global marketplace. Through the sales of artisan works and other empowering goods we will be able to fund all of our campaigns going forward without the need for public donations. This makes our initiative self-sustainable.

Phase II - Our campaigns will give us the means to continue to spread the energy of love and Empowerment to people in all corners of the world. 

Phase III - Empower It Forward  becomes a personal and tangible system of belief. A belief in mutual empowerment. More and more people and entities begin to believe in helping to make people's dreams come true by empowering them. 



March: Poverty Eradication Initiative (Kiva)

The solutions to the world's greatest social issues will not come from governments or political leaders. They will come from people.

PEOPLE JUST LIKE YOU.

Kiva is a non-profit organization with a mission to connect people through lending to alleviate poverty. Leveraging the internet and a worldwide network of microfinance institutions, Kiva lets individuals lend as little as $25 to help create opportunity around the world.


Access to financial solutions Empowers people living in poverty to transform their lives, their children's futures and their communities. 

Our Empower It Forward plan with Kiva: As loans are paid back, they are then re-distributed back out, further extending the reach and potential of each loan made, Empowering the lives of not one, but many entrepreneurs who need the support. 



"Desolenator will provide families with the ability to turn salt water and contaminated water into pure drinking water. The technology has the potential to provide water independence for up to a billion people living in coastal and water stressed areas - using the power of the sun alone. Join our journey to disrupt the global water crisis!" - The Desolenator Team

           

Check out & support their crowdfunding campaign by sharing it on Facebook. It is now live  here on Indiegogo:    http://igg.me/at/desolenator/x/9285437

We will be Empowering It Forward 10% of our entire funding campaign to pre-order Desolenators to co-sponsor a project at a school in a water deprived village in Tamil Nadu, India. Will be sharing detail soon here on our campaign. 


Here's how you can get involved. Be part of the solution, show your support & be rewarded by the  Empower It Forward Project.

Opt Out Reward Option: Want to support the movement but not interested in the rewards? No problem. Just fill in the field in the upper right of the campaign that says "select a contribution amount below," & we'll donate the cost of the reward toward funding our  Desolenator sponsorship!

                                                  Our First Raffle Has A Winner!



We can imagine a time when someone walks into a store and asks, "Are you a part of Empower It Forward?" or, "What cause does your organization support?" And if they say no/none, "Sorry we can't shop here." And we can imagine the same for:

  • Schools/Colleges
  • Doctors/Pharmacies
  • Energy/Utility Companies

The list goes on and it all starts with your help. 

Imagine a world where business and commerce are redesigned to be used as tools for Empowering life on planet Earth. 



This is not a fantasy. It is already a reality...


Our message is simple: If you're going to shop, shop with purpose. Start supporting people & brands that make a difference.


  • Decided on our first two causes to support. Kiva & the Desolentator represent three out of four MpoweredLife cause pillars; Poverty, Sustainability, Innovation & Education. 
  • Partnered with a small collection of artisans who believe in our mission and vision. In Bali now, scouting and recruiting many more to add to our growing list of artisans.
  • Secured a direct line to a Fair Trade Women's Co-operative in Morocco for the purest, highest grade, certified organic Argan Oil. Argan Oil is in very high demand in the global market and represents a valuable asset to our portfolio of products. 

      

    Fair Trade empowers women workers and women-owned businesses around the world. Buying via Fair Trade guarantees women workers have access to health care, rights, and the freedom from harassment. Women around the world often face unequal treatment in terms of wages and rights and come up against discrimination. Farms that are Fair Trade certified empower women through education and leadership roles, not only within their families but also within the cooperatives where they work.
  • Building a team of networkers, affiliates and supporters. With the launch of our FB Fan Page and already over 1,000 likes in our first few days of the campaign, this list is growing considerably. 




In 2011 a 29 Day giving challenge changed my life. This is that story and a major part of the inspiration for launching this project: How Giving Changed My Life

   

(Click here to watch another interview on how this project was inspired & the vision for the future) 


In 2011, I received my first big taste of how rewarding it can be to Empower others less fortunate, when I was invited by my High School Health teacher to go on a trip to the Dominican Republic, with her non-profit Una Vida (One Life in Spanish). In a small village called La Descubierta, very close to the Haitian border, we mixed cement by hand and laid concrete flooring in many of the local homes, helping to reduce the likelihood of disease caused by dirt floors. The trip was designed to give high school students an opportunity to see the great contrast of life in a developing nation. An experience uniquely designed to illustrate how blessed and fortunate we are, with hopes of planting seeds within their consciousness, that would one day grow into beautiful flowers, inspiring a life of service. A very BIG seed was planted on that trip. I just wasn't expecting it to be within me. 

The DR is also where I was first introduced to an Una Vida creation, called Madres. This was the project that inspired our concept of Empowering rural artisans by supporting their craft & creativity. 


The Madres Jewelry Collective was created in 2011 in Los Pinos del Eden, Dominican Republic, a rural mountain community near the Dominican-Haitian border. In a culture burdened by inequality and steeped in economic woe, women in poverty often have few resources to support themselves and their families. By paying fair wages in an area with little formal employment, our program empowers mothers to invest in their future and the future of their families. Madres employs both Dominican and Haitian women, building solidarity between two cultures that have endured centuries of mistrust stemming from colonial legacies and competition for scarce resources on an impoverished island. By providing sustainable incomes and opportunities for cross-cultural collaboration, Madres is fostering enduring change in Los Pinos. 


Our Greatest Challenge -- Establishing Credibility & Earning Trust

People have a hard time giving their trust to companies they've never heard of before. There are so many non-profits and charities (we are neither) who have faced an extreme amount of bad press and scrutiny for misusing/misappropriating funds, as well as not following through with their promises and commitments.

Solution: Prove ourselves. Our aim is to make our entire business model COMPLETELY transparent. As funds come in and are disbursed out to that month's campaign there will be verifiable evidence and proof (by way of tracking and digital screen shots) that funds ended up where promised. This is also the reason why we plan to be extremely selective when it comes to causes we'll support. Causes where funds go directly to individuals, groups and projects ensure we have oversight as to fund distribution. Earning trust takes time and most importantly consistency.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Ryan Bueler and I have been a homebrewer and craft beer enthusiast for the past 8 years. Throughout those years I have been learning as much as I can about the brewing process, beer flavors, and styles. I have taught many family members and friends how to brew beer and help them develop their own beer palette. Everyone has different tastes when it comes to beer. Some like it hoppy, others like it dark and malty, and some only like yellow beer. I want to create a place where beer drinkers of all kinds can come together and feel at home. A place where you do not have to feel ashamed for not knowing styles of beers or certain flavor descriptors, but at the same time I want beer nerds to be able to come in and geek it up!  That is why I am starting up Beer Scout, a Craft Beer establishment in Portland, Oregon. 

At Beer Scout, we plan to provide Portland’s gigantic beer drinking community with an opportunity to experience an impressive array of local craft beers as well as beers from across the country that they can consume onsite or take to-go either by the bottle or by filling a growler.  Our goal is to have 8-10 quality craft beers, ciders, and/or meads on tap. We will be offering 100-200 different bottled beers, kept cold and ready to drink on premise or to take home and enjoy. We will also be selling and filling growlers from our taps. We are going to create a Scout board for customers to request beers they want to try and we will work with our distributors to get them in for everyone to enjoy.

We plan on providing an educational aspect to the business by partnering up with local homebrew clubs, breweries, and supply stores. Our goal is to create events that customers can participate in to help develop beer knowledge, palettes, and off-flavor recognition. 

We want to focus all of our energy on our beers and not on food, so we will be collaborating with local food carts and/or catering services who know how to make delicious foods, to provide food while you enjoy beer.

Our design plan is to build a comfortable and functional taphouse that will allow our patrons to have a nice place to relax after a long day of work or on every available weekend. We plan to use as many recycled and “upcycled” products as possible in our design and we have a big focus on a low environmental impact. We plan to have FREE games (life sized connect 4, mini-shuffle board type game, etc) designed for social interaction that will make people want to call us their hangout.

 I am raising funds in order to meet my down payment obligation required for a small business loan through the SBA. By contributing to our campaign you will help create a small business in the craft beer industry and help me fulfill my dream. 


What We Need & What You Get

We need $14,000 to put towards a down payment for an SBA loan we are acquiring through Umpqua bank. The SBA loan will provide the majority of startup funding to purchase tap equipment, coolers, and inventory. Without your contribution we can not take our first steps on this journey.

We are offering several awesome perks to thank you for helping us achieve our goal. 

$5 -You Rock!

We want to thank you for being awesome and helping a fellow human start a business.

$10 -BS Swag

We want to give you some awesome Beer Scout swag. Ok its a few random beer related bumper stickers in various styles and sizes.

$20 -Pop n Lock

Get yourself a rad homemade bottle opener! Its made from solid oak and a solid screw. If it looks primitive thats because it is, but it works fantastic.. They come laser etched with "Beer Scout" on one side and "#craftbeer" on the other. Dimensions are 6"L x .75"w x .75"D

$30 -I'd Tap That!

For being so awesome we wanted you to know, we'd tap that. Get your minds out of the gutter, we are referring to kegs of course. Or rather our T-shirts. For this perk you will get a Unisex t-shirt available in S,M,L,XL. Made of 50% preshrunk cotton & 50% polyester. Front: "I'd Tap That" Back: #craftbeer and our logo (Please Specify the Color (black or white) and the size you want) *see image gallery for more details

$50 -The Trilogy

You will receive the "Id Tap That", "Pop n Lock", & "BS Swag". To translate; that is the t-shirt, bottle opener, and stickers. Please specify the color of shirt (black or white) and the size (S,M,L,XL).

$100 -You're the Bees Knees

You will get your name on an awesome plaque or board of some sort, showcasing that you helped get us up and running. "We could not do this with out these individuals:" Or something like that. The point is that we will let all of our customers know that you rock. *if you don't want your name visible make a name up*

$500 -Shut the Front Door

No way you are donating $500? That's so awesome! For this you will get your name put on a chair, table, or the bar, depending on our final layout and decor. We want you to be visible to our customers so they know with no uncertainty you rock! *if you would like to remain anonymous that is ok too, at least come up with a cool name like Turd Ferguson or something*

If we do not reach our intended goal, we will be putting the money into a savings account for the business. We will continue to fund the account through donations and owner contributions until we get the amount we need to secure an SBA loan. 

The Impact

Beer Scout is all about craft beer. We want to bring amazing craft beers to everyone we can. We are always learning about craft beer and brewing processes and love to spread the knowledge to others. By contributing you will help strengthen the craft brewing community. We have the business plan, the passion, and the knowledge but we need your help in securing our financing.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please post our campaign on your social media or emails, we could really use your help spreading the word. Even if you can't afford to donate, a simple share will help greatly.
story_txt: Short SummaryMy name is Ryan Bueler and I have been a homebrewer and craft beer enthusiast for the past 8 years. Throughout those years I have been learning as much as I can about the brewing process, beer flavors, and styles. I have taught many family members and friends how to brew beer and help them develop their own beer palette. Everyone has different tastes when it comes to beer. Some like it hoppy, others like it dark and malty, and some only like yellow beer. I want to create a place where beer drinkers of all kinds can come together and feel at home. A place where you do not have to feel ashamed for not knowing styles of beers or certain flavor descriptors, but at the same time I want beer nerds to be able to come in and geek it up!  That is why I am starting up Beer Scout, a Craft Beer establishment in Portland, Oregon. At Beer Scout, we plan to provide Portland’s gigantic beer drinking community with an opportunity to experience an impressive array of local craft beers as well as beers from across the country that they can consume onsite or take to-go either by the bottle or by filling a growler.  Our goal is to have 8-10 quality craft beers, ciders, and/or meads on tap. We will be offering 100-200 different bottled beers, kept cold and ready to drink on premise or to take home and enjoy. We will also be selling and filling growlers from our taps. We are going to create a Scout board for customers to request beers they want to try and we will work with our distributors to get them in for everyone to enjoy.We plan on providing an educational aspect to the business by partnering up with local homebrew clubs, breweries, and supply stores. Our goal is to create events that customers can participate in to help develop beer knowledge, palettes, and off-flavor recognition. We want to focus all of our energy on our beers and not on food, so we will be collaborating with local food carts and/or catering services who know how to make delicious foods, to provide food while you enjoy beer.Our design plan is to build a comfortable and functional taphouse that will allow our patrons to have a nice place to relax after a long day of work or on every available weekend. We plan to use as many recycled and “upcycled” products as possible in our design and we have a big focus on a low environmental impact. We plan to have FREE games (life sized connect 4, mini-shuffle board type game, etc) designed for social interaction that will make people want to call us their hangout. I am raising funds in order to meet my down payment obligation required for a small business loan through the SBA. By contributing to our campaign you will help create a small business in the craft beer industry and help me fulfill my dream. What We Need & What You GetWe need $14,000 to put towards a down payment for an SBA loan we are acquiring through Umpqua bank. The SBA loan will provide the majority of startup funding to purchase tap equipment, coolers, and inventory. Without your contribution we can not take our first steps on this journey.We are offering several awesome perks to thank you for helping us achieve our goal. $5 -You Rock!We want to thank you for being awesome and helping a fellow human start a business.$10 -BS SwagWe want to give you some awesome Beer Scout swag. Ok its a few random beer related bumper stickers in various styles and sizes.$20 -Pop n LockGet yourself a rad homemade bottle opener! Its made from solid oak and a solid screw. If it looks primitive thats because it is, but it works fantastic.. They come laser etched with "Beer Scout" on one side and "#craftbeer" on the other. Dimensions are 6"L x .75"w x .75"D$30 -I'd Tap That!For being so awesome we wanted you to know, we'd tap that. Get your minds out of the gutter, we are referring to kegs of course. story:
Short Summary

  • Uncle G's Fresh Pizza is a mobile pizza tent serving up a hand-crafted fresh-fired pizza to the Birmingham and Pelham areas.
  • Not a pizza truck, more like a pizza tent. Customers will place orders in advance and pick up during a selected time frame at a specific location.
  • All Pizzas are either NY Style or Crispy Edge Pan Pizza (like Detroit style). 

What We Need & What You Get

  • I have put together a business plan and estimate that I will need about $10,000 to get this business off the ground.
  • In return for your donation, you can receive perks like coupons for free pizza, SWAG (T-shirts, koozies, sunglasses, mugs, stickers, etc), an invitation to our private soft opening party, a private pizza party for between 8 and 20 people, dollar off pizza for a year, a pizza named after you, and more!
  • Even if we don't reach our goal, we will use funds to purchase licenses and buy ingredients

The Impact

  • Your contribution will enable Uncle G's Fresh Pizza to become a real business, serving Birmingham and Pelham AL!

Risks & Challenges

  • Foodservice is a tough industry, and many restaurants fail. This mobile operation is relatively "COVID-proof" and George's passion for pizza-making is unmatched!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, you can still help!

  • Please share this campaign on social media, e-mail, via word of mouth, or however you can!
  • You can use the IndieGoGo "share" tools to easily share this campaign

Thank you for your support!!!!
